Fechas del Sistema

SELECT SYSTIMESTAMP FROM DUAL;

SELECT CURRENT_DATE FROM DUAL;

SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'Q') FROM DUAL;

SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'MM') FROM DUAL;

SELECT ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, +8) FROM DUAL;

select to_char(sysdate, 'mm/dd/yyyy hh24:mi:ss') from dual;

--Primer dia del mes
SELECT TRUNC (SYSDATE, 'MONTH') "First day of current month" FROM DUAL;

--Buena pagina para fechas y otros ejemplos con SQL
https://viralpatel.net/blogs/useful-oracle-queries/
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Para calcular los porcentajes del comercio (version con totales)

SELECT ELEMENT18,DESCRIPCION,
    COUNT(*) CUENTA,
    sum(count(*)) over() TOTAL_CNT,
    round(100*(count(*) / sum(count(*)) over ()),2) PERCNT
FROM FNT_ECRUCES.DISPOSCNS_DEL_01FEB14
GROUP BY ELEMENT18,DESCRIPCION
ORDER BY 3 DESC

Para calcular los porcentajes del comercio (version simple)

SELECT ELEMENT18
      ,DESCRIPCION
      ,round(100*ratio_to_report(count(*)) over (), 2) perc
FROM FNT_ECRUCES.DISPOSCNS_DEL_01FEB14
GROUP BY ELEMENT18,DESCRIPCION
ORDER BY 3 DESC

Para calcular los porcentajes del comercio (version suma total)

SELECT ELEMENT18
      ,DESCRIPCION
      ,round(100*ratio_to_report(count(*)) over (), 2) perc
      ,sum(CAPITALAUTORIZADO) as TOTAL
FROM FNT_ECRUCES.DISPOSCNS_DEL_30NOV14
GROUP BY ELEMENT18,DESCRIPCION
ORDER BY 3 DESC

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Para conocer la version de Oracle

select * from v$version;
select * from product_component_version;

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Para sumar una columna y grand gran total (totalizar al final)

SELECT NVL(TO_CHAR(ELEMENT18),'TOTAL') AS TOTAL_GIRO, SUM(CAPITALAUTORIZADO)
FROM FNT_ECRUCES.DISPOSCNS_DEL_01FEB14
GROUP BY ROLLUP (ELEMENT18)
ORDER BY 2 DESC;

SELECT SUM(CAPITALAUTORIZADO)
FROM FNT_ECRUCES.DISPOSCNS_DEL_01FEB14

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Generar un cubo
http://www.dba-oracle.com/t_cube.htm

Generar un cubo (ejemplo)
SELECT 
    ELEMENT18
   ,NVL(TO_CHAR(NROTARJETA),'TOTAL')   
   ,sum(CAPITALAUTORIZADO) total
   ,count(CAPITALAUTORIZADO) cuenta
   ,GROUPING(ELEMENT18) ge
   ,GROUPING(NROTARJETA) gt    
   FROM FNT_ECRUCES.DISPOSCNS_DEL_01FEB14
   WHERE ELEMENT18 > 0
   AND NROTARJETA IN ('5498800087657699','5498800087683471')   
   GROUP BY CUBE(ELEMENT18,NROTARJETA);

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Para crear una tabla por agrupamiento

DROP TABLE TMP_SALES_COUNTRY;

CREATE TABLE TMP_SALES_COUNTRY (
   COUNTRY varchar2 (20),
   PRODUCT varchar2 (20), 
   N_YEAR varchar2 (10), 
   SALES number (25,4)   
);

INSERT INTO TMP_SALES_COUNTRY VALUES ('Italy','Bounce','1999','2474.78');
INSERT INTO TMP_SALES_COUNTRY VALUES ('Italy','Bounce','2000','4333.69');
INSERT INTO TMP_SALES_COUNTRY VALUES ('Italy','Bounce','2001','4846.3');

INSERT INTO TMP_SALES_COUNTRY VALUES ('Italy','Y Box','1999','15215.16');
INSERT INTO TMP_SALES_COUNTRY VALUES ('Italy','Y Box','2000','29322.89');
INSERT INTO TMP_SALES_COUNTRY VALUES ('Italy','Y Box','2001','81207.55');

INSERT INTO TMP_SALES_COUNTRY VALUES ('Japan','Bounce','1999','2961.3');
INSERT INTO TMP_SALES_COUNTRY VALUES ('Japan','Bounce','2000','5133.53');
INSERT INTO TMP_SALES_COUNTRY VALUES ('Japan','Bounce','2001','6303.6');

INSERT INTO TMP_SALES_COUNTRY VALUES ('Japan','Y Box','1999','22161.91');
INSERT INTO TMP_SALES_COUNTRY VALUES ('Japan','Y Box','2000','45690.66');
INSERT INTO TMP_SALES_COUNTRY VALUES ('Japan','Y Box','2001','89634.83');
commit;

SELECT * FROM TMP_SALES_COUNTRY;

SELECT country,product, n_year, sales
FROM TMP_SALES_COUNTRY
WHERE country IN ('Italy', 'Japan')
MODEL
  PARTITION BY (country) DIMENSION BY (product, n_year)
  MEASURES (sales sales)
  RULES 
  (sales['Bounce', 2002] = sales['Bounce', 2001] + sales['Bounce', 2000],
   sales['Y Box', 2002] = sales['Y Box', 2001],
   sales['All_Products', 2002] = sales['Bounce', 2002] + sales['Y Box', 2002])
ORDER BY country, product, n_year;

Referencia = http://docs.oracle.com/cd/B19306_01/server.102/b14223/sqlmodel.htm
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
CONSULTAR PARA UN PERIODO DE FECHA INDICADOR COBRANZA 2DA SEGUNDA GENERACION GENERACIÓN

SELECT *
FROM TOPAZ.CR_CEDULAS_CABEZAL A 
WHERE CONCAT(A.ANIO_EMISION,A.MES_EMISION) ='20141'

SELECT *
FROM TOPAZ.CR_CEDULAS_CABEZAL A 
WHERE CONCAT(A.ANIO_EMISION,A.MES_EMISION) ='201312'
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Consultar la distribucio en comercios en porcentaje (super supermercado)

SELECT CLAVE_COM
      ,DESC_CORTA
      ,round(100*ratio_to_report(count(*)) over (), 4) perc
FROM FNT_ECRUCES.TRANSACC
GROUP BY CLAVE_COM,DESC_CORTA
ORDER BY 3 DESC
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Actualizar el sexo en la tabla FNT_ECRUCES.TRANSACC

UPDATE FNT_ECRUCES.TRANSACC
SET SEXO = 'M' WHERE SEXO = 'H'
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Análisis de Transacciones FNT_ECRUCES.TRANSACC

SELECT FECHAAUTORIZADO,COUNT(*)
FROM FNT_ECRUCES.TRANSACC
GROUP BY FECHAAUTORIZADO
ORDER BY FECHAAUTORIZADO DESC;

SELECT *
FROM FNT_ECRUCES.TRANSACC;

Mineria Transacciones
SELECT SEXO,COUNT(*), round(100*(count(*) / sum(count(*)) over ()),2) PERCNT
FROM FNT_ECRUCES.TRANSACC
GROUP BY SEXO;

SELECT EDOCIV,COUNT(*), round(100*(count(*) / sum(count(*)) over ()),2) PERCNT
FROM FNT_ECRUCES.TRANSACC
GROUP BY EDOCIV
ORDER BY 3 DESC;

SELECT SUCURSAL_ID,NOMBRE_SUCURSAL,COUNT(*), round(100*(count(*) / sum(count(*)) over ()),2) PERCNT
FROM FNT_ECRUCES.TRANSACC
WHERE SUCURSAL_ID <= 99
GROUP BY SUCURSAL_ID,NOMBRE_SUCURSAL
ORDER BY 4 DESC;

SELECT CLAVE_USUARIO,COUNT(*), round(100*(count(*) / sum(count(*)) over ()),2) PERCNT
FROM FNT_ECRUCES.TRANSACC
GROUP BY CLAVE_USUARIO
ORDER BY 3 DESC;

SELECT CLAVE_USUARIO,SUM(CAPITALAUTORIZADO), round(100*(count(*) / sum(count(*)) over ()),2) PERCNT
FROM FNT_ECRUCES.TRANSACC
GROUP BY CLAVE_USUARIO
ORDER BY 2 DESC;

SELECT DIAS_DIF,COUNT(*), round(100*(count(*) / sum(count(*)) over ()),2) PERCNT
FROM FNT_ECRUCES.TRANSACC
GROUP BY DIAS_DIF
ORDER BY 3 DESC;

SELECT TIPOVIV,COUNT(*), round(100*(count(*) / sum(count(*)) over ()),2) PERCNT
FROM FNT_ECRUCES.TRANSACC
GROUP BY TIPOVIV
ORDER BY 3 DESC;

SELECT NIVELEST,COUNT(*), round(100*(count(*) / sum(count(*)) over ()),2) PERCNT
FROM FNT_ECRUCES.TRANSACC
GROUP BY NIVELEST
ORDER BY 3 DESC;

SELECT DIASEMCT,COUNT(*), round(100*(count(*) / sum(count(*)) over ()),2) PERCNT
FROM FNT_ECRUCES.TRANSACC
GROUP BY DIASEMCT
ORDER BY 3 DESC;

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Para identificar pagos completos y en tiempo

SELECT 
    A.ANIO_EMISION
    ,A.MES_EMISION
    ,A.ID_CENTRO_TRABAJO
    ,A.FECHA_EMISION
    ,A.FECHA_PROGRAMADA_PAGO
    ,A.FECHA_LIMITE_PAGO
    ,A.FECHA_ULTIMO_PAGO
    ,A.TOTAL_EMITIDO
    ,A.TOTAL_PAGADO
    ,B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT
    ,A.FECHA_ULTIMO_PAGO-A.FECHA_LIMITE_PAGO AS PUNTUAL
    ,C.CLIENTE_ID
    ,C.TIPO_PERSONA_MORAL AS TIPO_PERS
    ,C.NOMBRE_COMPLETO,
     CASE 
      WHEN A.FECHA_ULTIMO_PAGO-A.FECHA_LIMITE_PAGO <= 0 THEN '1'
      ELSE '0'              
     END AS N_TIEMPO,
     CASE 
      WHEN A.TOTAL_PAGADO>=A.TOTAL_EMITIDO THEN '1'
      ELSE '0'              
     END AS N_COMPLETO,
     CASE
      WHEN A.FECHA_ULTIMO_PAGO-A.FECHA_LIMITE_PAGO <= 0 AND A.TOTAL_PAGADO>=A.TOTAL_EMITIDO THEN '1'
      ELSE '0'
     END AS N_TIEMPOYCOMPL
FROM TOPAZ.CR_CEDULAS_CABEZAL A
LEFT JOIN FNT_ECRUCES.TMP_INCID_201405 B ON A.ID_CENTRO_TRABAJO=B.ID_CENTRO_TRABAJO
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.CL_PERSONAS_MORALES C ON A.ID_CENTRO_TRABAJO=C.CLIENTE_ID
WHERE A.TZ_LOCK=0
AND C.TZ_LOCK=0
AND A.ANIO_EMISION=2014
AND A.MES_EMISION=5
ORDER BY A.FECHA_EMISION,A.FECHA_PROGRAMADA_PAGO,A.FECHA_LIMITE_PAGO;
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Para seleccionar nombre centro de trabajo sin el enter chr(13)+chr(10) usar=
replace(replace(C.NOMBRE_COMPLETO,CHR(13),''),CHR(10),' ') as NOMBRE_COMPL

SELECT
     A.ANIO_EMISION    
    ,replace(replace(C.NOMBRE_COMPLETO,CHR(13),''),CHR(10),' ') as NOMBRE_COMPL
    ,A.MES_EMISION
    ,A.ID_CENTRO_TRABAJO
    ,A.FECHA_EMISION
    ,A.FECHA_PROGRAMADA_PAGO
    ,A.FECHA_LIMITE_PAGO
    ,A.FECHA_ULTIMO_PAGO
    ,A.TOTAL_EMITIDO
    ,A.TOTAL_PAGADO
    ,B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT
    ,A.FECHA_ULTIMO_PAGO-A.FECHA_LIMITE_PAGO AS PUNTUAL
    ,round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2) as PORCT
    ,C.CLIENTE_ID
    ,C.TIPO_PERSONA_MORAL AS TIPO_PERS    
    ,CASE 
      WHEN A.FECHA_ULTIMO_PAGO-A.FECHA_LIMITE_PAGO <= 0 THEN '1'
      ELSE '0'              
     END AS N_TIEMPO,
     CASE 
      WHEN A.TOTAL_PAGADO>=A.TOTAL_EMITIDO THEN '1'
      ELSE '0'              
     END AS N_COMPLETO,
     CASE
      WHEN A.FECHA_ULTIMO_PAGO-A.FECHA_LIMITE_PAGO <= 0 AND A.TOTAL_PAGADO>=A.TOTAL_EMITIDO THEN '1'
      ELSE '0'
     END AS N_TIEMPOYCOMPL
FROM TOPAZ.CR_CEDULAS_CABEZAL A
LEFT JOIN FNT_ECRUCES.TMP_INCID_201401 B ON A.ID_CENTRO_TRABAJO=B.ID_CENTRO_TRABAJO
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.CL_PERSONAS_MORALES C ON A.ID_CENTRO_TRABAJO=C.CLIENTE_ID
WHERE A.TZ_LOCK=0
AND C.TZ_LOCK=0
AND A.ANIO_EMISION=2014
AND A.MES_EMISION=1;
--AND C.NOMBRE_COMPLETO LIKE 'BUS MEN%';
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Para seleccionar los Buckets (esta version ya pone la columna de bucket en automatico)
--VERSION PARA INTRANET

SELECT
     A.ANIO_EMISION    
    ,A.MES_EMISION
    ,A.ID_CENTRO_TRABAJO
    ,SUBSTR(replace(replace(C.NOMBRE_COMPLETO,CHR(13),''),CHR(10),' '),1,25) as CENTRO_TRABAJO
    ,A.FECHA_EMISION
    ,A.FECHA_PROGRAMADA_PAGO
    ,A.FECHA_LIMITE_PAGO
    ,A.FECHA_ULTIMO_PAGO
    ,A.TOTAL_EMITIDO
    ,A.TOTAL_PAGADO
    ,NVL(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0) as INCIDENCIAS_AA01
    ,A.FECHA_ULTIMO_PAGO-A.FECHA_LIMITE_PAGO AS DIAS_ATRASO
    ,round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2) as PORCT
    ,A.ID_CENTRO_TRABAJO as CLIENTE_ID
    ,C.TIPO_PERSONA_MORAL AS APARTADO,
     CASE 
      WHEN A.FECHA_ULTIMO_PAGO-A.FECHA_LIMITE_PAGO <= 0 THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS PAGO_A_TIEMPO,
     CASE 
      WHEN A.TOTAL_PAGADO>=A.TOTAL_EMITIDO THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS PAGO_COMPLETO,
     CASE
      WHEN A.FECHA_ULTIMO_PAGO-A.FECHA_LIMITE_PAGO <= 0 AND A.TOTAL_PAGADO>=A.TOTAL_EMITIDO THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS PAGO_TIEMPOYCOMPL,
     -------------------------
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)=0 THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_0,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>0 AND 
           round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<0.75 THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_0_A_75,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>=0.75 AND 
           round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<0.90 THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_75_A_90,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>=0.90 AND 
           round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<1.00 THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_90_A_100,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)=1.00 THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_100,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>1.00 THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_MAS_100,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<0 THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_MENOR_0,               
     -----------------------
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)=0 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_PAGADO,0)-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_PAG_0,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>0 AND 
           round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<0.75 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_PAGADO,0)-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_PAG_0_A_75,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>=0.75 AND 
           round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<0.90 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_PAGADO,0)-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_PAG_75_A_90,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>=0.90 AND 
           round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<1.00 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_PAGADO,0)-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_PAG_90_A_100,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)=1.00 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_PAGADO,0)-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_PAG_100,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>1.00 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_PAGADO,0)-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_PAG_MAS_100,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<0 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_PAGADO,0)-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_PAG_MENOR_0,     
     --------------------------
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)=0 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_EMI_0,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>0 AND 
           round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<0.75 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_EMI_0_A_75,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>=0.75 AND 
           round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<0.90 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_EMI_75_A_90,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>=0.90 AND 
           round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<1.00 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_EMI_90_A_100,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)=1.00 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_EMI_100,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>1.00 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_EMI_MAS_100,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<0 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_EMI_MENOR_0
     ---------------------------          
FROM TOPAZ.CR_CEDULAS_CABEZAL A
LEFT JOIN FNT_ECRUCES.TMP_INCID_201401 B ON A.ID_CENTRO_TRABAJO=B.ID_CENTRO_TRABAJO
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.CL_PERSONAS_MORALES C ON A.ID_CENTRO_TRABAJO=C.CLIENTE_ID
WHERE A.TZ_LOCK=0
AND C.TZ_LOCK=0
AND A.ANIO_EMISION=2014
AND A.MES_EMISION=4 --IN (1,2,3,4,5,6)
ORDER BY A.ANIO_EMISION,A.MES_EMISION,A.ID_CENTRO_TRABAJO;

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Para determinar la cantidad de creditos emitidos:

SELECT SUM(CNT_TOTAL_EMITIDOS)
FROM TOPAZ.CR_CEDULAS_CABEZAL
WHERE TZ_LOCK=0 
AND ANIO_EMISION=2014
AND MES_EMISION=8;

Para determinar la cantidad de trabajadores en una emisión:

SELECT SUM(CNT_LINEAS_TRABAJADOR)
FROM TOPAZ.CR_CEDULAS_CABEZAL
WHERE TZ_LOCK=0 
AND ANIO_EMISION=2014
AND MES_EMISION=8;

Para determinar cuantos centros de trabajo existen en la emisión:

SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM TOPAZ.CR_CEDULAS_CABEZAL
WHERE TZ_LOCK=0 
AND ANIO_EMISION=2014
AND MES_EMISION=8;

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
--VERSION PARA INTRANET
/*
CREATE TABLE FNT_ECRUCES.TMP_INCID_201408 AS
SELECT ANIO_EMISION,MES_EMISION,ID_CENTRO_TRABAJO,COD_INCIDENCIA,SUM(IMPORTE_RETENIDO) AS IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT
FROM TOPAZ.CR_CEDULAS_INCIDENCIAS 
WHERE TZ_LOCK=0 
AND ANIO_EMISION=2014
AND MES_EMISION=8
AND COD_INCIDENCIA='AA01'
GROUP BY ANIO_EMISION,MES_EMISION,ID_CENTRO_TRABAJO,COD_INCIDENCIA
ORDER BY ANIO_EMISION,MES_EMISION,ID_CENTRO_TRABAJO,COD_INCIDENCIA;
*/

SELECT
     A.ANIO_EMISION    
    ,A.MES_EMISION
    ,A.ID_CENTRO_TRABAJO
    ,SUBSTR(replace(replace(C.NOMBRE_COMPLETO,CHR(13),''),CHR(10),' '),1,25) as CENTRO_TRABAJO
    ,A.FECHA_EMISION
    ,A.FECHA_PROGRAMADA_PAGO
    ,A.FECHA_LIMITE_PAGO
    ,A.FECHA_ULTIMO_PAGO
    ,A.TOTAL_EMITIDO
    ,A.TOTAL_PAGADO
    ,NVL(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0) as INCIDENCIAS_AA01
    ,A.FECHA_ULTIMO_PAGO-A.FECHA_LIMITE_PAGO AS DIAS_ATRASO
    ,round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2) as PORCT
    ,C.TIPO_PERSONA_MORAL AS APARTADO,
     CASE 
      WHEN A.FECHA_ULTIMO_PAGO-A.FECHA_LIMITE_PAGO <= 0 THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS PAGO_A_TIEMPO,
     CASE 
      WHEN A.TOTAL_PAGADO>=A.TOTAL_EMITIDO THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS PAGO_COMPLETO,
     CASE
      WHEN A.FECHA_ULTIMO_PAGO-A.FECHA_LIMITE_PAGO <= 0 AND A.TOTAL_PAGADO>=A.TOTAL_EMITIDO THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS PAGO_TIEMPOYCOMPL,
     -------------------------
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)=0 THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_0,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>0 AND 
           round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<0.75 THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_0_A_75,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>=0.75 AND 
           round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<0.90 THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_75_A_90,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>=0.90 AND 
           round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<1.00 THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_90_A_100,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)=1.00 THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_100,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>1.00 THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_MAS_100,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<0 THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_MENOR_0,               
     -----------------------
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)=0 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_PAGADO,0)-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_PAG_0,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>0 AND 
           round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<0.75 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_PAGADO,0)-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_PAG_0_A_75,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>=0.75 AND 
           round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<0.90 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_PAGADO,0)-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_PAG_75_A_90,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>=0.90 AND 
           round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<1.00 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_PAGADO,0)-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_PAG_90_A_100,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)=1.00 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_PAGADO,0)-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_PAG_100,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>1.00 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_PAGADO,0)-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_PAG_MAS_100,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<0 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_PAGADO,0)-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_PAG_MENOR_0,     
     --------------------------
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)=0 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_EMI_0,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>0 AND 
           round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<0.75 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_EMI_0_A_75,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>=0.75 AND 
           round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<0.90 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_EMI_75_A_90,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>=0.90 AND 
           round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<1.00 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_EMI_90_A_100,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)=1.00 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_EMI_100,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>1.00 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_EMI_MAS_100,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<0 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_EMI_MENOR_0
     ---------------------------          
FROM TOPAZ.CR_CEDULAS_CABEZAL A
LEFT JOIN FNT_ECRUCES.TMP_INCID_201401 B ON A.ID_CENTRO_TRABAJO=B.ID_CENTRO_TRABAJO
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.CL_PERSONAS_MORALES C ON A.ID_CENTRO_TRABAJO=C.CLIENTE_ID
WHERE A.TZ_LOCK=0
AND C.TZ_LOCK=0
AND A.ANIO_EMISION=2014
AND A.MES_EMISION=1
UNION
SELECT
     A.ANIO_EMISION    
    ,A.MES_EMISION
    ,A.ID_CENTRO_TRABAJO
    ,SUBSTR(replace(replace(C.NOMBRE_COMPLETO,CHR(13),''),CHR(10),' '),1,25) as CENTRO_TRABAJO
    ,A.FECHA_EMISION
    ,A.FECHA_PROGRAMADA_PAGO
    ,A.FECHA_LIMITE_PAGO
    ,A.FECHA_ULTIMO_PAGO
    ,A.TOTAL_EMITIDO
    ,A.TOTAL_PAGADO
    ,NVL(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0) as INCIDENCIAS_AA01
    ,A.FECHA_ULTIMO_PAGO-A.FECHA_LIMITE_PAGO AS DIAS_ATRASO
    ,round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2) as PORCT
    ,C.TIPO_PERSONA_MORAL AS APARTADO,
     CASE 
      WHEN A.FECHA_ULTIMO_PAGO-A.FECHA_LIMITE_PAGO <= 0 THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS PAGO_A_TIEMPO,
     CASE 
      WHEN A.TOTAL_PAGADO>=A.TOTAL_EMITIDO THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS PAGO_COMPLETO,
     CASE
      WHEN A.FECHA_ULTIMO_PAGO-A.FECHA_LIMITE_PAGO <= 0 AND A.TOTAL_PAGADO>=A.TOTAL_EMITIDO THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS PAGO_TIEMPOYCOMPL,
     -------------------------
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)=0 THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_0,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>0 AND 
           round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<0.75 THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_0_A_75,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>=0.75 AND 
           round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<0.90 THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_75_A_90,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>=0.90 AND 
           round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<1.00 THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_90_A_100,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)=1.00 THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_100,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>1.00 THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_MAS_100,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<0 THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_MENOR_0,               
     -----------------------
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)=0 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_PAGADO,0)-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_PAG_0,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>0 AND 
           round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<0.75 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_PAGADO,0)-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_PAG_0_A_75,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>=0.75 AND 
           round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<0.90 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_PAGADO,0)-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_PAG_75_A_90,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>=0.90 AND 
           round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<1.00 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_PAGADO,0)-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_PAG_90_A_100,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)=1.00 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_PAGADO,0)-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_PAG_100,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>1.00 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_PAGADO,0)-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_PAG_MAS_100,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<0 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_PAGADO,0)-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_PAG_MENOR_0,     
     --------------------------
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)=0 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_EMI_0,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>0 AND 
           round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<0.75 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_EMI_0_A_75,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>=0.75 AND 
           round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<0.90 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_EMI_75_A_90,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>=0.90 AND 
           round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<1.00 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_EMI_90_A_100,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)=1.00 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_EMI_100,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>1.00 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_EMI_MAS_100,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<0 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_EMI_MENOR_0
     ---------------------------          
FROM TOPAZ.CR_CEDULAS_CABEZAL A
LEFT JOIN FNT_ECRUCES.TMP_INCID_201402 B ON A.ID_CENTRO_TRABAJO=B.ID_CENTRO_TRABAJO
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.CL_PERSONAS_MORALES C ON A.ID_CENTRO_TRABAJO=C.CLIENTE_ID
WHERE A.TZ_LOCK=0
AND C.TZ_LOCK=0
AND A.ANIO_EMISION=2014
AND A.MES_EMISION=2
UNION
SELECT
     A.ANIO_EMISION    
    ,A.MES_EMISION
    ,A.ID_CENTRO_TRABAJO
    ,SUBSTR(replace(replace(C.NOMBRE_COMPLETO,CHR(13),''),CHR(10),' '),1,25) as CENTRO_TRABAJO
    ,A.FECHA_EMISION
    ,A.FECHA_PROGRAMADA_PAGO
    ,A.FECHA_LIMITE_PAGO
    ,A.FECHA_ULTIMO_PAGO
    ,A.TOTAL_EMITIDO
    ,A.TOTAL_PAGADO
    ,NVL(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0) as INCIDENCIAS_AA01
    ,A.FECHA_ULTIMO_PAGO-A.FECHA_LIMITE_PAGO AS DIAS_ATRASO
    ,round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2) as PORCT
    ,C.TIPO_PERSONA_MORAL AS APARTADO,
     CASE 
      WHEN A.FECHA_ULTIMO_PAGO-A.FECHA_LIMITE_PAGO <= 0 THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS PAGO_A_TIEMPO,
     CASE 
      WHEN A.TOTAL_PAGADO>=A.TOTAL_EMITIDO THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS PAGO_COMPLETO,
     CASE
      WHEN A.FECHA_ULTIMO_PAGO-A.FECHA_LIMITE_PAGO <= 0 AND A.TOTAL_PAGADO>=A.TOTAL_EMITIDO THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS PAGO_TIEMPOYCOMPL,
     -------------------------
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)=0 THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_0,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>0 AND 
           round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<0.75 THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_0_A_75,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>=0.75 AND 
           round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<0.90 THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_75_A_90,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>=0.90 AND 
           round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<1.00 THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_90_A_100,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)=1.00 THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_100,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>1.00 THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_MAS_100,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<0 THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_MENOR_0,               
     -----------------------
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)=0 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_PAGADO,0)-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_PAG_0,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>0 AND 
           round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<0.75 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_PAGADO,0)-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_PAG_0_A_75,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>=0.75 AND 
           round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<0.90 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_PAGADO,0)-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_PAG_75_A_90,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>=0.90 AND 
           round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<1.00 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_PAGADO,0)-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_PAG_90_A_100,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)=1.00 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_PAGADO,0)-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_PAG_100,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>1.00 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_PAGADO,0)-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_PAG_MAS_100,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<0 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_PAGADO,0)-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_PAG_MENOR_0,     
     --------------------------
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)=0 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_EMI_0,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>0 AND 
           round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<0.75 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_EMI_0_A_75,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>=0.75 AND 
           round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<0.90 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_EMI_75_A_90,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>=0.90 AND 
           round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<1.00 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_EMI_90_A_100,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)=1.00 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_EMI_100,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>1.00 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_EMI_MAS_100,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<0 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_EMI_MENOR_0
     ---------------------------          
FROM TOPAZ.CR_CEDULAS_CABEZAL A
LEFT JOIN FNT_ECRUCES.TMP_INCID_201403 B ON A.ID_CENTRO_TRABAJO=B.ID_CENTRO_TRABAJO
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.CL_PERSONAS_MORALES C ON A.ID_CENTRO_TRABAJO=C.CLIENTE_ID
WHERE A.TZ_LOCK=0
AND C.TZ_LOCK=0
AND A.ANIO_EMISION=2014
AND A.MES_EMISION=3
UNION
SELECT
     A.ANIO_EMISION    
    ,A.MES_EMISION
    ,A.ID_CENTRO_TRABAJO
    ,SUBSTR(replace(replace(C.NOMBRE_COMPLETO,CHR(13),''),CHR(10),' '),1,25) as CENTRO_TRABAJO
    ,A.FECHA_EMISION
    ,A.FECHA_PROGRAMADA_PAGO
    ,A.FECHA_LIMITE_PAGO
    ,A.FECHA_ULTIMO_PAGO
    ,A.TOTAL_EMITIDO
    ,A.TOTAL_PAGADO
    ,NVL(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0) as INCIDENCIAS_AA01
    ,A.FECHA_ULTIMO_PAGO-A.FECHA_LIMITE_PAGO AS DIAS_ATRASO
    ,round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2) as PORCT
    ,C.TIPO_PERSONA_MORAL AS APARTADO,
     CASE 
      WHEN A.FECHA_ULTIMO_PAGO-A.FECHA_LIMITE_PAGO <= 0 THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS PAGO_A_TIEMPO,
     CASE 
      WHEN A.TOTAL_PAGADO>=A.TOTAL_EMITIDO THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS PAGO_COMPLETO,
     CASE
      WHEN A.FECHA_ULTIMO_PAGO-A.FECHA_LIMITE_PAGO <= 0 AND A.TOTAL_PAGADO>=A.TOTAL_EMITIDO THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS PAGO_TIEMPOYCOMPL,
     -------------------------
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)=0 THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_0,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>0 AND 
           round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<0.75 THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_0_A_75,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>=0.75 AND 
           round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<0.90 THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_75_A_90,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>=0.90 AND 
           round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<1.00 THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_90_A_100,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)=1.00 THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_100,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>1.00 THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_MAS_100,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<0 THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_MENOR_0,               
     -----------------------
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)=0 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_PAGADO,0)-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_PAG_0,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>0 AND 
           round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<0.75 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_PAGADO,0)-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_PAG_0_A_75,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>=0.75 AND 
           round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<0.90 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_PAGADO,0)-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_PAG_75_A_90,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>=0.90 AND 
           round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<1.00 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_PAGADO,0)-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_PAG_90_A_100,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)=1.00 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_PAGADO,0)-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_PAG_100,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>1.00 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_PAGADO,0)-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_PAG_MAS_100,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<0 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_PAGADO,0)-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_PAG_MENOR_0,     
     --------------------------
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)=0 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_EMI_0,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>0 AND 
           round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<0.75 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_EMI_0_A_75,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>=0.75 AND 
           round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<0.90 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_EMI_75_A_90,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>=0.90 AND 
           round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<1.00 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_EMI_90_A_100,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)=1.00 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_EMI_100,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>1.00 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_EMI_MAS_100,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<0 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_EMI_MENOR_0
     ---------------------------          
FROM TOPAZ.CR_CEDULAS_CABEZAL A
LEFT JOIN FNT_ECRUCES.TMP_INCID_201404 B ON A.ID_CENTRO_TRABAJO=B.ID_CENTRO_TRABAJO
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.CL_PERSONAS_MORALES C ON A.ID_CENTRO_TRABAJO=C.CLIENTE_ID
WHERE A.TZ_LOCK=0
AND C.TZ_LOCK=0
AND A.ANIO_EMISION=2014
AND A.MES_EMISION=4
UNION
SELECT
     A.ANIO_EMISION    
    ,A.MES_EMISION
    ,A.ID_CENTRO_TRABAJO
    ,SUBSTR(replace(replace(C.NOMBRE_COMPLETO,CHR(13),''),CHR(10),' '),1,25) as CENTRO_TRABAJO
    ,A.FECHA_EMISION
    ,A.FECHA_PROGRAMADA_PAGO
    ,A.FECHA_LIMITE_PAGO
    ,A.FECHA_ULTIMO_PAGO
    ,A.TOTAL_EMITIDO
    ,A.TOTAL_PAGADO
    ,NVL(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0) as INCIDENCIAS_AA01
    ,A.FECHA_ULTIMO_PAGO-A.FECHA_LIMITE_PAGO AS DIAS_ATRASO
    ,round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2) as PORCT
    ,C.TIPO_PERSONA_MORAL AS APARTADO,
     CASE 
      WHEN A.FECHA_ULTIMO_PAGO-A.FECHA_LIMITE_PAGO <= 0 THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS PAGO_A_TIEMPO,
     CASE 
      WHEN A.TOTAL_PAGADO>=A.TOTAL_EMITIDO THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS PAGO_COMPLETO,
     CASE
      WHEN A.FECHA_ULTIMO_PAGO-A.FECHA_LIMITE_PAGO <= 0 AND A.TOTAL_PAGADO>=A.TOTAL_EMITIDO THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS PAGO_TIEMPOYCOMPL,
     -------------------------
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)=0 THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_0,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>0 AND 
           round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<0.75 THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_0_A_75,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>=0.75 AND 
           round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<0.90 THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_75_A_90,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>=0.90 AND 
           round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<1.00 THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_90_A_100,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)=1.00 THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_100,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>1.00 THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_MAS_100,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<0 THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_MENOR_0,               
     -----------------------
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)=0 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_PAGADO,0)-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_PAG_0,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>0 AND 
           round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<0.75 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_PAGADO,0)-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_PAG_0_A_75,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>=0.75 AND 
           round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<0.90 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_PAGADO,0)-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_PAG_75_A_90,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>=0.90 AND 
           round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<1.00 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_PAGADO,0)-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_PAG_90_A_100,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)=1.00 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_PAGADO,0)-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_PAG_100,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>1.00 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_PAGADO,0)-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_PAG_MAS_100,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<0 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_PAGADO,0)-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_PAG_MENOR_0,     
     --------------------------
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)=0 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_EMI_0,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>0 AND 
           round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<0.75 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_EMI_0_A_75,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>=0.75 AND 
           round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<0.90 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_EMI_75_A_90,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>=0.90 AND 
           round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<1.00 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_EMI_90_A_100,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)=1.00 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_EMI_100,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>1.00 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_EMI_MAS_100,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<0 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_EMI_MENOR_0
     ---------------------------          
FROM TOPAZ.CR_CEDULAS_CABEZAL A
LEFT JOIN FNT_ECRUCES.TMP_INCID_201405 B ON A.ID_CENTRO_TRABAJO=B.ID_CENTRO_TRABAJO
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.CL_PERSONAS_MORALES C ON A.ID_CENTRO_TRABAJO=C.CLIENTE_ID
WHERE A.TZ_LOCK=0
AND C.TZ_LOCK=0
AND A.ANIO_EMISION=2014
AND A.MES_EMISION=5
UNION
SELECT
     A.ANIO_EMISION    
    ,A.MES_EMISION
    ,A.ID_CENTRO_TRABAJO
    ,SUBSTR(replace(replace(C.NOMBRE_COMPLETO,CHR(13),''),CHR(10),' '),1,25) as CENTRO_TRABAJO
    ,A.FECHA_EMISION
    ,A.FECHA_PROGRAMADA_PAGO
    ,A.FECHA_LIMITE_PAGO
    ,A.FECHA_ULTIMO_PAGO
    ,A.TOTAL_EMITIDO
    ,A.TOTAL_PAGADO
    ,NVL(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0) as INCIDENCIAS_AA01
    ,A.FECHA_ULTIMO_PAGO-A.FECHA_LIMITE_PAGO AS DIAS_ATRASO
    ,round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2) as PORCT
    ,C.TIPO_PERSONA_MORAL AS APARTADO,
     CASE 
      WHEN A.FECHA_ULTIMO_PAGO-A.FECHA_LIMITE_PAGO <= 0 THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS PAGO_A_TIEMPO,
     CASE 
      WHEN A.TOTAL_PAGADO>=A.TOTAL_EMITIDO THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS PAGO_COMPLETO,
     CASE
      WHEN A.FECHA_ULTIMO_PAGO-A.FECHA_LIMITE_PAGO <= 0 AND A.TOTAL_PAGADO>=A.TOTAL_EMITIDO THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS PAGO_TIEMPOYCOMPL,
     -------------------------
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)=0 THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_0,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>0 AND 
           round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<0.75 THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_0_A_75,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>=0.75 AND 
           round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<0.90 THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_75_A_90,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>=0.90 AND 
           round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<1.00 THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_90_A_100,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)=1.00 THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_100,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>1.00 THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_MAS_100,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<0 THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_MENOR_0,               
     -----------------------
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)=0 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_PAGADO,0)-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_PAG_0,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>0 AND 
           round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<0.75 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_PAGADO,0)-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_PAG_0_A_75,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>=0.75 AND 
           round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<0.90 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_PAGADO,0)-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_PAG_75_A_90,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>=0.90 AND 
           round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<1.00 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_PAGADO,0)-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_PAG_90_A_100,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)=1.00 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_PAGADO,0)-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_PAG_100,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>1.00 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_PAGADO,0)-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_PAG_MAS_100,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<0 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_PAGADO,0)-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_PAG_MENOR_0,     
     --------------------------
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)=0 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_EMI_0,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>0 AND 
           round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<0.75 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_EMI_0_A_75,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>=0.75 AND 
           round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<0.90 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_EMI_75_A_90,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>=0.90 AND 
           round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<1.00 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_EMI_90_A_100,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)=1.00 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_EMI_100,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>1.00 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_EMI_MAS_100,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<0 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_EMI_MENOR_0
     ---------------------------          
FROM TOPAZ.CR_CEDULAS_CABEZAL A
LEFT JOIN FNT_ECRUCES.TMP_INCID_201406 B ON A.ID_CENTRO_TRABAJO=B.ID_CENTRO_TRABAJO
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.CL_PERSONAS_MORALES C ON A.ID_CENTRO_TRABAJO=C.CLIENTE_ID
WHERE A.TZ_LOCK=0
AND C.TZ_LOCK=0
AND A.ANIO_EMISION=2014
AND A.MES_EMISION=6
UNION
SELECT
     A.ANIO_EMISION    
    ,A.MES_EMISION
    ,A.ID_CENTRO_TRABAJO
    ,SUBSTR(replace(replace(C.NOMBRE_COMPLETO,CHR(13),''),CHR(10),' '),1,25) as CENTRO_TRABAJO
    ,A.FECHA_EMISION
    ,A.FECHA_PROGRAMADA_PAGO
    ,A.FECHA_LIMITE_PAGO
    ,A.FECHA_ULTIMO_PAGO
    ,A.TOTAL_EMITIDO
    ,A.TOTAL_PAGADO
    ,NVL(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0) as INCIDENCIAS_AA01
    ,A.FECHA_ULTIMO_PAGO-A.FECHA_LIMITE_PAGO AS DIAS_ATRASO
    ,round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2) as PORCT
    ,C.TIPO_PERSONA_MORAL AS APARTADO,
     CASE 
      WHEN A.FECHA_ULTIMO_PAGO-A.FECHA_LIMITE_PAGO <= 0 THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS PAGO_A_TIEMPO,
     CASE 
      WHEN A.TOTAL_PAGADO>=A.TOTAL_EMITIDO THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS PAGO_COMPLETO,
     CASE
      WHEN A.FECHA_ULTIMO_PAGO-A.FECHA_LIMITE_PAGO <= 0 AND A.TOTAL_PAGADO>=A.TOTAL_EMITIDO THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS PAGO_TIEMPOYCOMPL,
     -------------------------
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)=0 THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_0,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>0 AND 
           round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<0.75 THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_0_A_75,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>=0.75 AND 
           round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<0.90 THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_75_A_90,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>=0.90 AND 
           round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<1.00 THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_90_A_100,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)=1.00 THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_100,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>1.00 THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_MAS_100,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<0 THEN 1
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_MENOR_0,               
     -----------------------
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)=0 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_PAGADO,0)-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_PAG_0,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>0 AND 
           round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<0.75 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_PAGADO,0)-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_PAG_0_A_75,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>=0.75 AND 
           round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<0.90 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_PAGADO,0)-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_PAG_75_A_90,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>=0.90 AND 
           round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<1.00 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_PAGADO,0)-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_PAG_90_A_100,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)=1.00 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_PAGADO,0)-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_PAG_100,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>1.00 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_PAGADO,0)-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_PAG_MAS_100,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<0 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_PAGADO,0)-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_PAG_MENOR_0,     
     --------------------------
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)=0 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_EMI_0,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>0 AND 
           round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<0.75 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_EMI_0_A_75,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>=0.75 AND 
           round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<0.90 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_EMI_75_A_90,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>=0.90 AND 
           round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<1.00 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_EMI_90_A_100,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)=1.00 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_EMI_100,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)>1.00 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_EMI_MAS_100,
     CASE
      WHEN round((A.TOTAL_PAGADO-nvl(B.IMPORTE_RETENIDO_TOT,0))/A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,2)<0 THEN nvl(A.TOTAL_EMITIDO,0)
      ELSE 0
     END AS BUCKET_EMI_MENOR_0
     ---------------------------          
FROM TOPAZ.CR_CEDULAS_CABEZAL A
LEFT JOIN FNT_ECRUCES.TMP_INCID_201407 B ON A.ID_CENTRO_TRABAJO=B.ID_CENTRO_TRABAJO
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.CL_PERSONAS_MORALES C ON A.ID_CENTRO_TRABAJO=C.CLIENTE_ID
WHERE A.TZ_LOCK=0
AND C.TZ_LOCK=0
AND A.ANIO_EMISION=2014
AND A.MES_EMISION=7;

SELECT STDDEV(salary) FROM EMPLOYEE;

Utilizar select anidado

SELECT e.empid, e.salary
FROM emp e
WHERE e.dept =
(SELECT dept FROM emp WHERE empid =
(SELECT empid FROM invoice WHERE invoice_number = 5640));

Para ingresar una variable en tiempo de exec

SELECT *
FROM TOPAZ.CR_CEDULAS_CABEZAL
WHERE ANIO_EMISION=2014
AND MES_EMISION=&EMISION_MES;
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Email

SELECT
    A.TZ_LOCK,    
    A.CLIENTE_ID,
    E.FECHA_ALTA,
    E.SUCURSAL_ID,
    E.STATUS,  
    A.TIPO,    
    replace(replace(A.NOM_CALLE,CHR(13),''),CHR(10),' ') as NOM_CALLE,
    A.NUM_EXT,
    A.NUM_INT,    
    replace(replace(A.REF_UBICA,CHR(13),''),CHR(10),' ') as REF_UBICA,
    A.COD_POSTAL,
    A.TEL_FIJO_AREA,
    A.TEL_FIJO_NUM,
    A.TEL_FIJO_EXT,
    A.TEL_2_CLIENTE_AREA,
    A.TEL_2_CLIENTE,
    A.TEL_2_CLIENTE_EXT,
    A.TEL_CEL_NUM,    
    replace(replace(A.EMAIL_CLIENTE,CHR(13),''),CHR(10),' ') as EMAIL_CLIENTE,
    A.NOMBRE_COLONIA,
    A.USUARIO,
    A.OPERACION,
    B.NOMBRE_COLONIA,
    C.NOMBRE_MUNICIPIO,
    D.NOMBRE_ESTADO
FROM 
    TOPAZ.CL_CLIENTES_DIR A
    LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.TC_COLONIAS B ON A.CLAVE_COLONIA=B.CLAVE_COLONIA
    LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.TC_MUNICIPIOS C ON A.CLAVE_MUNICIPIO=C.CLAVE_MUNICIPIO
    LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.TC_ESTADOS D ON A.CLAVE_ESTADO=D.CLAVE_ESTADO 
    LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.CL_CLIENTES E ON A.CLIENTE_ID = E.CLIENTE_ID
WHERE 
    A.TZ_LOCK=0 
    AND B.TZ_LOCK=0
    AND C.TZ_LOCK=0
    AND D.TZ_LOCK=0    
    AND E.TZ_LOCK=0
    AND A.TIPO=1     
    AND TRIM(A.EMAIL_CLIENTE) <> ' '
    AND FECHA_ALTA BETWEEN '01/01/2013' AND '31/12/2014';
    --AND E.STATUS=1  
    --AND A.CLIENTE_ID = '147108274';
    
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Seleccionar la fecha maxima de avance en FNT_ECRUCES.TRANSACC

SELECT FECHAAUTORIZADO,COUNT(ROWID)
FROM FNT_ECRUCES.TRANSACC
GROUP BY FECHAAUTORIZADO
ORDER BY FECHAAUTORIZADO DESC;
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Tres atrasos consecutivos (versión correcta)

SELECT 
    A.ID_CENTRO_TRABAJO
   ,B.STATUS
   ,COUNT(*) AS TOTAL
FROM TOPAZ.CR_CEDULAS_CABEZAL A LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.CL_CLIENTES B
     ON A.ID_CENTRO_TRABAJO=B.CLIENTE_ID
WHERE A.TZ_LOCK=0 
AND CONCAT(A.ANIO_EMISION,A.MES_EMISION) IN ('20146','20145','20144')
AND A.TOTAL_PAGADO<=0
AND B.STATUS=1
GROUP BY A.ID_CENTRO_TRABAJO,B.STATUS
HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Trasponer tabla con centros de trabajo

SELECT
     A.ID_CENTRO_TRABAJO AS CT_ID
    ,SUBSTR(replace(replace(B.NOMBRE_COMPLETO,CHR(13),''),CHR(10),' '),1,20) as CT_NOMB
    ,B.STATUS
    ,SUM(DECODE(CONCAT(A.ANIO_EMISION,A.MES_EMISION),'20145', A.TOTAL_EMITIDO)) E20145    
    ,SUM(DECODE(CONCAT(A.ANIO_EMISION,A.MES_EMISION),'20145', A.TOTAL_PAGADO)) P20145    
    ,SUM(DECODE(CONCAT(A.ANIO_EMISION,A.MES_EMISION),'20144', A.TOTAL_EMITIDO)) E20144    
    ,SUM(DECODE(CONCAT(A.ANIO_EMISION,A.MES_EMISION),'20144', A.TOTAL_PAGADO)) P20144    
    ,SUM(DECODE(CONCAT(A.ANIO_EMISION,A.MES_EMISION),'20143', A.TOTAL_EMITIDO)) E20143    
    ,SUM(DECODE(CONCAT(A.ANIO_EMISION,A.MES_EMISION),'20143', A.TOTAL_PAGADO)) P20143    
    ,SUM(DECODE(CONCAT(A.ANIO_EMISION,A.MES_EMISION),'20142', A.TOTAL_EMITIDO)) E20142    
    ,SUM(DECODE(CONCAT(A.ANIO_EMISION,A.MES_EMISION),'20142', A.TOTAL_PAGADO)) P20142    
    ,SUM(DECODE(CONCAT(A.ANIO_EMISION,A.MES_EMISION),'20141', A.TOTAL_EMITIDO)) E20141
    ,SUM(DECODE(CONCAT(A.ANIO_EMISION,A.MES_EMISION),'20141', A.TOTAL_PAGADO)) P20141
    ,SUM(DECODE(CONCAT(A.ANIO_EMISION,A.MES_EMISION),'201312', A.TOTAL_EMITIDO)) E201312
    ,SUM(DECODE(CONCAT(A.ANIO_EMISION,A.MES_EMISION),'201312', A.TOTAL_PAGADO)) P201312
    ,SUM(DECODE(CONCAT(A.ANIO_EMISION,A.MES_EMISION),'201311', A.TOTAL_EMITIDO)) E201311
    ,SUM(DECODE(CONCAT(A.ANIO_EMISION,A.MES_EMISION),'201311', A.TOTAL_PAGADO)) P201311
    ,SUM(DECODE(CONCAT(A.ANIO_EMISION,A.MES_EMISION),'201310', A.TOTAL_EMITIDO)) E201310
    ,SUM(DECODE(CONCAT(A.ANIO_EMISION,A.MES_EMISION),'201310', A.TOTAL_PAGADO)) P201310
    ,SUM(DECODE(CONCAT(A.ANIO_EMISION,A.MES_EMISION),'201309', A.TOTAL_EMITIDO)) E20139
    ,SUM(DECODE(CONCAT(A.ANIO_EMISION,A.MES_EMISION),'201309', A.TOTAL_PAGADO)) P20139    
    ,SUM(DECODE(CONCAT(A.ANIO_EMISION,A.MES_EMISION),'201308', A.TOTAL_EMITIDO)) E20138
    ,SUM(DECODE(CONCAT(A.ANIO_EMISION,A.MES_EMISION),'201308', A.TOTAL_PAGADO)) P20138             
FROM TOPAZ.CR_CEDULAS_CABEZAL A LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.CL_CLIENTES B
     ON A.ID_CENTRO_TRABAJO=B.CLIENTE_ID
WHERE CONCAT(A.ANIO_EMISION,A.MES_EMISION) IN ('20145','20144','20143','20142','20141','201312','201311','201310','20139','20138')
GROUP BY A.ID_CENTRO_TRABAJO,B.NOMBRE_COMPLETO,B.STATUS
ORDER BY 1; 

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Utilizar un Cursor (habilitar DBMS Output con Ctrl+Alt+D)

DECLARE
   c_id_ct TOPAZ.CR_CEDULAS_CABEZAL.id_centro_trabajo%type;
   c_line_wrk TOPAZ.CR_CEDULAS_CABEZAL.cnt_lineas_trabajador%type;
   c_f_emision TOPAZ.CR_CEDULAS_CABEZAL.fecha_emision%type;
   CURSOR c_cabezal is
      SELECT ID_CENTRO_TRABAJO,CNT_LINEAS_TRABAJADOR,FECHA_EMISION 
      FROM TOPAZ.CR_CEDULAS_CABEZAL WHERE ANIO_EMISION=2013 AND ID_CENTRO_TRABAJO=1127109;      
BEGIN
   OPEN c_cabezal;
   LOOP
      FETCH c_cabezal into c_id_ct, c_line_wrk, c_f_emision;
      EXIT WHEN c_cabezal%notfound;
      dbms_output.put_line(c_id_ct || ' ' || c_line_wrk || ' ' || c_f_emision);
   END LOOP;
   CLOSE c_cabezal;
END;

Select * todos + 1

SELECT FECHA_ALTA,TOPAZ.CL_CLIENTES.*
FROM TOPAZ.CL_CLIENTES
WHERE CLIENTE_ID='500006659';

Regresa el primero no nulo

SELECT COALESCE( address1, address2, address3 ) result
FROM suppliers;
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Insertar en diferentes tablas dependiendo de una variable

INSERT FIRST
   WHEN ottl < 100000 THEN
      INTO small_orders
         VALUES(oid, ottl, sid, cid)
   WHEN ottl > 100000 AND ottl < 200000 THEN
      INTO medium_orders
         VALUES(oid, ottl, sid, cid)
   WHEN ottl > 290000 THEN
      INTO special_orders
   WHEN ottl > 200000 THEN
      INTO large_orders
         VALUES(oid, ottl, sid, cid)
   SELECT o.order_id oid, o.customer_id cid, o.order_total ottl,
      o.sales_rep_id sid, c.credit_limit cl, c.cust_email cem
      FROM orders o, customers c
      WHERE o.customer_id = c.customer_id;
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Insertar utilizando diferentes tablas origen

DROP TABLE TEST;
CREATE TABLE TEST (a NUMBER, b VARCHAR(10), c VARCHAR(10));
 
INSERT INTO TEST VALUES ( 15, 'abc','def' );
INSERT INTO TEST VALUES (998, 'max','min' );
INSERT INTO TEST VALUES (  7, 'bla','bla' );
INSERT INTO TEST VALUES (632, 'now','then');

SELECT * FROM TEST;
 
INSERT INTO TEST 
  (a,b,c)
  (SELECT                   AA,
                            BB,
                            CC 
  FROM
    (SELECT MAX(a) +1       AA      FROM TEST), 
    (SELECT 'new'           BB      FROM dual),
    (SELECT 'abm'           CC      FROM dual));
 
--tambien se puede
    (SELECT 'new'           BB,
            'old'           CC      FROM dual));

SELECT * FROM TEST
SELECT * FROM TEST WHERE a = (SELECT MAX(a) FROM TEST);
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Generar un procedimiento almacenado

DROP PROCEDURE remove_emp;

CREATE PROCEDURE remove_emp (employee_id NUMBER) AS   
   BEGIN
      DELETE FROM TMP_EMPLOYEES
      WHERE TMP_EMPLOYEES.EMPLOYEE_ID = remove_emp.employee_id;   
   COMMIT;
   END;
   
DROP TABLE TMP_EMPLOYEES;

CREATE TABLE TMP_EMPLOYEES (
   EMPLOYEE_ID number (7),
   NAME varchar2 (60), 
   IN_YEAR date, 
   OUT_YEAR date   
);

INSERT INTO TMP_EMPLOYEES VALUES ('1','FLANDERS','01/01/2010','01/05/2015');
INSERT INTO TMP_EMPLOYEES VALUES ('2','MR.BURNS','01/01/2011','11/03/2013');
INSERT INTO TMP_EMPLOYEES VALUES ('3','BART','01/01/2012','21/06/2013');
INSERT INTO TMP_EMPLOYEES VALUES ('4','HOMER','01/01/2013','24/07/2012');
INSERT INTO TMP_EMPLOYEES VALUES ('5','MARGE','01/01/2014','15/08/2014');
COMMIT;

--DELETE FROM TMP_EMPLOYEES;

SELECT * FROM TMP_EMPLOYEES;

exec remove_emp(1);
exec remove_emp(2);
exec remove_emp(3);

Renombrar una tabla

RENAME cars TO vehicles;
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Inner Join Básico

DECLARE
    x  NUMBER := 100;
BEGIN
    FOR i IN 1..10 LOOP
     IF MOD(i,2) = 0 THEN     -- i is even
         INSERT INTO temp VALUES (i, x, 'i is even');
     ELSE
         INSERT INTO temp VALUES (i, x, 'i is odd');
     END IF;
 
     x := x + 100;        
    END LOOP;
    COMMIT;
END;
