Para mostrar en formato de pesos

SELECT COMERCIO,to_char(TOTAL,'9999,999,999.99') AS TOTAL
FROM TMP_COMERCIO;
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Lista de comercios bloqueados envio beto

SELECT ID_COMERCIO,NOMBRE_COMERCIO,FECHA_BLOQUEO
FROM TOPAZ.TF_BLOQUEO_EC
WHERE FECHA_BLOQUEO BETWEEN '01/12/14' AND '31/12/14'
ORDER BY FECHA_BLOQUEO;
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Múltiples conteos count dentro de una tabla multiples múltiples select

create table myTable (
  this  Varchar2(10),
  that  Varchar2(10)
);

insert into myTable values ('that'     , 'the other');
insert into myTable values ('confusing', 'the other');
insert into myTable values ('this'     , 'that'     );
insert into myTable values ('this'     , 'that'     );
insert into myTable values ('that'     , 'confusing');
insert into myTable values ('confusing', 'that'     );
insert into myTable values ('confusing', 'confusing');
insert into myTable values ('that'     , 'the other');
insert into myTable values ('this'     , 'that'     );
insert into myTable values ('confusing', 'the other');

select 
  count(
    case when 
      this = 'that' and 
      that = 'the other'
    then 1
    else null end) "Count 1",
  count(
    case when 
      this = 'this' and 
      that = 'that'
    then 1
    else null end) "Count 2",
  count(
    case when 
      this = 'confusing'
    then 1
    else null end) "Count 3"
from
  myTable;
-------------------------------------------------------------------------

--How many hours, minutes and seconds are 5000 seconds?
select to_char(to_date(10000,'sssss'),'hh24:mi:ss') as Timer from dual;

--comprobacion
select 2*60*60 + 46*60 + 40 as Total from dual;

--En el caso de más de 86400 segundos, incluir los días
select                 
       floor(12345678/86400) || 'd ' || 
       to_char(to_date(mod  (12345678,86400) ,'sssss'),'hh24"h" mi"m" ss"s"') as Total
from dual;

--Verificando
select 142 * 24 * 60 * 60 +
        21      * 60 * 60 +
        21           * 60 +
        18
from dual;

------------------------------------------------------------------------
En esta página seleccionamos los TOP N Queries
http://www.adp-gmbh.ch/ora/sql/analytical/top_n.html

Find the first three (alphabetically-wise) numbers:
Selecciona los tres primeros lugares en orden alfabético

create table top_n_test (
   a number,
   b varchar2(10)
);

insert into top_n_test values (1,   'one');
insert into top_n_test values (2,   'two');
insert into top_n_test values (3, 'three');
insert into top_n_test values (4,  'four');
insert into top_n_test values (5,  'five');
insert into top_n_test values (6,   'six');
insert into top_n_test values (7, 'seven');
insert into top_n_test values (8, 'eight');
insert into top_n_test values (9,  'nine');
commit;

select a, b from (
  select
    a,b,
    rank() over (order by b) r
  from
    top_n_test
  )
where
  r<4;

Pagina que muestra diferentes funciones de fecha hora

Generación de números al azar

select dbms_random.random from dual;
select dbms_random.value from dual;
select dbms_random.value(1,1000) num from dual;
select dbms_random.string('U', 20) str from dual;
select dbms_random.string('L', 20) str from dual;
select dbms_random.string('A', 20) str from dual;
------------------------------------------------------------------------
replace cadena encriptar encrypt

In this demo a string is first encrypted then decrypted
SELECT TRANSLATE('this is a secret',
'abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvxyz', '0123456789qwertyuiop[kjhbv')
FROM DUAL;

SELECT TRANSLATE('p78o 8o 0 o42i4p',
'0123456789qwertyuiop[kjhbv', 'abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvxyz')
FROM DUAL;

Utilizar un PROMPT para solicitar valor del campo

SELECT   employee_id, last_name, job_id, &&column_name
    FROM     hr.employees
    ORDER BY &column_name ;
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Para obtener el IMSS historico de aquellos afiliados en el 98

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TOPAZ.TC_IMSS_TRAB 
WHERE STATUS='B' AND REGEXP_LIKE(NUMERO_AFILIACION, '^..98.......');

----------------------------------------------------------------------
Para obtener datos del trabajador completos

SELECT A.*, B.*,CEN.*,C.*,D.*,E.*,F.NOMBRE_SUCURSAL
FROM TOPAZ.CL_CLIENTES A 
    LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.CL_CLIENTES_DIR B ON A.CLIENTE_ID = B.CLIENTE_ID
    LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.CL_REL_CLIENTE_CT CEN ON A.CLIENTE_ID = CEN.CLIENTE_ID 
    LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.TC_COLONIAS C ON B.CLAVE_COLONIA=C.CLAVE_COLONIA
    LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.TC_MUNICIPIOS D ON B.CLAVE_MUNICIPIO=D.CLAVE_MUNICIPIO
    LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.TC_ESTADOS E ON B.CLAVE_ESTADO=E.CLAVE_ESTADO
    LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.TC_SUCURSALES F ON A.SUCURSAL_ID = F.SUCURSAL_ID 
WHERE A.TZ_LOCK = 0 
AND B.TZ_LOCK = 0
AND C.TZ_LOCK = 0
AND D.TZ_LOCK = 0
AND E.TZ_LOCK = 0
AND A.TIPO_CLIENTE=1
AND A.CLIENTE_ID IN (118724078,118728154)
ORDER BY A.CLIENTE_ID;
--------------------------------------------------------------------
COLUMN TOPAZ.CL_CLIENTES_DIR.TIPO IS 
Identificador Tipo de Domicilio del Cliente 
1 = Cliente, 
2 = Centro de Trabajo del Conyuge, 
3 = Referencia 1, 
4 = Referencia 2, 
5 = Centro de Trabajo Referencia 1, 
6 = Centro de Trabajo Referencia 2, 
7 = Representante
--------------------------------------------------------------------
REPRESENTANTES LEGALES DEL CT

TOPAZ.CL_REP_PERSONAS_MORALES
--------------------------------------------------------------------
Acceso a Base de datos del IMSS

TOPAZ.AUX_IMSS_CT
TOPAZ.AUX_IMSS_TRAB

--Buenas explicaciones de Oracle
--http://dba.fyicenter.com/faq/oracle/Relation-between-Tablespace-and-Data-File.html


--Crear un usuario
create user edd identified by edd;

--Dar permisos al usuario
grant CREATE SESSION, ALTER SESSION, CREATE DATABASE LINK,
  CREATE MATERIALIZED VIEW, CREATE PROCEDURE, CREATE PUBLIC SYNONYM,
  CREATE ROLE, CREATE SEQUENCE, CREATE SYNONYM, CREATE TABLE,
  CREATE TRIGGER, CREATE TYPE, CREATE VIEW, UNLIMITED TABLESPACE
  to edd;
  
--To list all the tables related the current user:
SELECT * FROM user_tables;

--List the tables accessible by the user:
SELECT * FROM all_tables;

--List all the tables (ADMIN):
SELECT * FROM dba_tables;

--Mostrar todas las bases de datos
SELECT TABLESPACE_NAME FROM USER_TABLESPACES;

--Mostrar todas las bases de datos(2)
select USERNAME, DEFAULT_TABLESPACE from DBA_USERS;

--Seleccionar todos los dbas
select * from dba_users; 

--View datafiles in the current database
SELECT TABLESPACE_NAME, FILE_NAME, BYTES FROM DBA_DATA_FILES;

--Crear una tabla
CREATE TABLE fyi_links (id NUMBER(4) PRIMARY KEY,
  url VARCHAR2(16) NOT NULL,
  notes VARCHAR2(16),
  counts NUMBER(4),
  created DATE DEFAULT (sysdate));

--Seleccionar  
SELECT * FROM fyi_links;

--Insertar
INSERT INTO fyi_links VALUES (2,'1','1',1,sysdate);

--Seleccionar la diferencia entre fechas en año-mes
SELECT
  (TO_DATE('01-MAY-2006 16:52:57','DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS')
   - 
   TO_DATE('31-ENE-1897 09:26:50','DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'))
  YEAR(4) TO MONTH FROM DUAL;
  -- 109 years and 3 months

--Seleccionar la diferencia entre fechas en dias y segundos
SELECT 
  (TO_DATE('01-MAY-2006 16:52:57','DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS')
   - 
   TO_DATE('31-ENE-1897 09:26:50','DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'))
  DAY(9) TO SECOND FROM DUAL;
  -- 39901 days and some seconds
  --39901 7:26:7.0  


SELECT CASE WHEN 3 IN (1,2,3,5) THEN 
  'TRUE' ELSE 'FALSE' END FROM DUAL;
--TRUE

SELECT CASE WHEN 3 NOT IN (1,2,3,5) THEN 
  'TRUE' ELSE 'FALSE' END FROM DUAL;
--FALSE   

SELECT CASE WHEN 'Y' IN ('F','Y','I') THEN 
  'TRUE' ELSE 'FALSE' END FROM DUAL;
--TRUE

--DIFERENTES FORMATOS DE FECHA
SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'DD-MON-YYYY') FROM DUAL;
-- SYSDATE returns the current date
--07-MAY-2006 

SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') FROM DUAL;
--2006/05/07 

SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'MONTH DD, YYYY') FROM DUAL;
--MAY 07, 2006

SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'fmMONTH DD, YYYY') FROM DUAL;
--May 7, 2006

SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'fmDAY, MONTH DD, YYYY') FROM DUAL;
--SUNDAY, MAY 7, 2006

SELECT TIMESTAMP '1997-01-31 09:26:50.124' FROM DUAL

--EL VALOR NULL
SELECT NULL FROM DUAL;
SELECT NULL + NULL FROM DUAL;
SELECT NULL || 'A' FROM DUAL;
SELECT NULL + SYSDATE FROM DUAL;

--Para ver funciones con NULL
--http://dba.fyicenter.com/faq/oracle/Use-NULL-as-Condition.html

--Expresiones Regulares
SELECT CASE WHEN REGEXP_LIKE ('FYICenter.com', '.*fyi.*',
  'i') THEN 'TRUE' ELSE 'FALSE' END FROM DUAL;

--Creacion de tabla mas compleja
CREATE TABLE tip (id NUMBER(5) PRIMARY KEY,
subject VARCHAR(80) NOT NULL,
description VARCHAR(256) NOT NULL,
create_date DATE DEFAULT (sysdate));

INSERT INTO TIP (id,subject,description) VALUES (1,'111','111');

SELECT * FROM TIP;

--Modificar Tabla
ALTER TABLE TIP ADD (vacation NUMBER);

--Eliminar Columna
ALTER TABLE emp_dept_90 DROP COLUMN last_name;

--Indice
CREATE INDEX tip_subject ON tip(subject);

--Renombra indice
ALTER INDEX SYS_C004153 RENAME TO student_pk;

--Eliminar indice
DROP INDEX STUDENT_BIRTH_DATE;

--Para ingresar desde la interfase web
http://localhost:8080/apex/

--Seleccionar los indices de mi esquema
SELECT index_name, table_name, uniqueness 
  FROM USER_INDEXES WHERE table_name = 'TIP';

--Unique key means it allows uniques values only... which means nulls too because according to Oracle each null is different from other.
--Primary key means the combination of Unique key and Not null constraint.

--Seleccionar los indices de una tabla con su columna
SELECT index_name, table_name, column_name 
  FROM USER_IND_COLUMNS WHERE table_name = 'TIP';
  
--Crear un indice con multiples columnas
CREATE INDEX student_names ON student(first_name,last_name);

begin 
  dbms_output.put_line('Welcome to FYICenter!'); 
end;

declare
  site char(80) := 'FYICenter';
  begin 
  Dbms_output.put_line('Welcome to ' || site); 
  end;
--------------------------------------------------------------------
05/10/2015 02:22:23 p.m.
para extraer clientes con nivel 5 de estudios en zona metro

SELECT A.*,B.*,C.NOMBRE_COLONIA,D.NOMBRE_MUNICIPIO,E.NOMBRE_ESTADO
FROM TOPAZ.CL_CLIENTES A
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.CL_CLIENTES_DIR B ON A.CLIENTE_ID=B.CLIENTE_ID
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.TC_COLONIAS C ON B.CLAVE_COLONIA=C.CLAVE_COLONIA
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.TC_MUNICIPIOS D ON B.CLAVE_MUNICIPIO=D.CLAVE_MUNICIPIO
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.TC_ESTADOS E ON B.CLAVE_ESTADO=E.CLAVE_ESTADO 
WHERE A.TIPO_CLIENTE = '01'
AND B.TIPO=1
AND A.NIVEL_ESTUDIOS >= 5
AND A.SUCURSAL_ID IN (SELECT SUCURSAL_ID FROM TOPAZ.TC_SUCURSALES WHERE TZ_LOCK=0 AND ZONA_SUCURSAL=1)
AND B.EMAIL_CLIENTE IS NOT NULL;
------------------------------------------------------------------------
06/10/2015 05:38:59 p.m.
Extractor de correos esta correcto, limpia los .gob y CRLF en campos string

SELECT DISTINCT
   replace(A.NOMBRE_COMPLETO, chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NOMBRE_COMPLETO
  ,replace(B.EMAIL_CLIENTE, chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS EMAIL_CLIENTE
  ,replace(D.NOMBRE_ESTADO, chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NOMBRE_ESTADO
  ,replace(C.NOMBRE_MUNICIPIO, chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NOMBRE_MUNICIPIO
FROM TOPAZ.CL_CLIENTES A
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.CL_CLIENTES_DIR B ON A.CLIENTE_ID=B.CLIENTE_ID
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.TC_MUNICIPIOS C ON B.CLAVE_MUNICIPIO=C.CLAVE_MUNICIPIO
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.TC_ESTADOS D ON B.CLAVE_ESTADO=D.CLAVE_ESTADO
WHERE A.TZ_LOCK=0
AND B.TZ_LOCK=0
AND A.TIPO_CLIENTE=2
AND B.TIPO=1
AND B.EMAIL_CLIENTE NOT LIKE '%.gob%';

------------------------------------------------------------------------
12/10/2015 11:00:02 a.m.
Extractor COMPLETO, limpia los CFLF de strings
SELECT 
 replace(A.TIPO_PERSONA,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TIPO_PERSONA
,replace(A.NOMBRE_COMPLETO,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NOMBRE_COMPLETO
,replace(A.NOMBRE_CORTO,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NOMBRE_CORTO
,replace(A.PRIMER_NOMBRE,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS PRIMER_NOMBRE
,replace(A.SEGUNDO_NOMBRE,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS SEGUNDO_NOMBRE
,replace(A.APELLIDO_PATERNO,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS APELLIDO_PATERNO
,replace(A.APELLIDO_MATERNO,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS APELLIDO_MATERNO
,replace(A.FECHA_NACIMIENTO,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS FECHA_NACIMIENTO
,replace(A.SEXO,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS SEXO
,replace(A.ESTADO_CIVIL,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS ESTADO_CIVIL
,replace(A.TIPO_VIVIENDA,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TIPO_VIVIENDA
,replace(A.NUM_ANIOS_HABITADA,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS ANIOS_HABITADA
,replace(A.NUM_PERSONAS_DEPEND,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NUM_PERS_DEPEND
,replace(A.IMPORTE_OTROS_INGRESOS,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS IMPORTE_OTROS_ING
,replace(A.NUM_PER_TRABAJAN,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NUM_PER_TRABAJAN
,replace(A.CREDITOS_CON,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS CREDITOS_CON
,replace(A.SUCURSAL_ID,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS SUCURSAL_ID
,replace(A.TRAMITA,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TRAMITA
,replace(A.STATUS,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS STATUS
,replace(A.ZONA_FRONTERIZA,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS ZONA_FRONTERIZA
,replace(A.COMO_SE_ENTERO,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS COMO_SE_ENTERO
,replace(A.COD_INTER_FINAN,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS COD_INTER_FINAN
,replace(A.COD_RESIDENCIA,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS COD_RESIDENCIA
,replace(A.SUB_DIV_INT_1,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS SUB_DIV_INT_1
,replace(A.SUB_DIV_INT_2,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS SUB_DIV_INT_2
,replace(A.SUB_DIV_INT_3,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS SUB_DIV_INT_3
,replace(A.ZONA_ECONOMICA,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS ZONA_ECONOMICA
,replace(A.FECHA_ALTA,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS FECHA_ALTA
,replace(A.FECHA_REACTIVACION,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS FECHA_REACTIVACION
,replace(A.FECHA_BAJA,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS FECHA_BAJA
,replace(A.TIPO_DOCUMENTO,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TIPO_DOCUMENTO
,replace(A.TIPO_CLIENTE,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TIPO_CLIENTE
,replace(A.NUMERO_DOCUMENTO,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NUMERO_DOCUMENTO
,replace(A.NUMERO_FONACOT,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NUMERO_FONACOT
,replace(A.RFC,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS RFC
,replace(A.NUM_SEG_SOCIAL,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NUM_SEG_SOCIAL
,replace(A.CURP,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS CURP
,replace(A.TIPO_AFILIACION,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TIPO_AFILIACION
,replace(A.NOMBRE_CONYUGE,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NOMBRE_CONYUGE
,replace(A.TRABAJA_CONYUGE,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TRABAJA_CONYUGE
,replace(A.CT_CONYUGE,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS CT_CONYUGE
,replace(A.NOMBRE_REF1,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NOMBRE_REF1
,replace(A.PARENTESCO_REF1,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS PARENTESCO_REF1
,replace(A.NOMBRE_REF2,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NOMBRE_REF2
,replace(A.PARENTESCO_REF2,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS PARENTESCO_REF2
,replace(A.TIPO_SEGURIDAD_SOCIAL,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TIPO_SEG_SOCIAL
,replace(A.MESES_HABITADA,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS MESES_HABITADA
,replace(A.ID_CT_CONYUGE,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS ID_CT_CONYUGE
,replace(A.PLAZOS_DEFECTO,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS PLAZOS_DEFECTO
,replace(A.NOM_CT_REF_1,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NOM_CT_REF_1
,replace(A.ID_CT_REF_2,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS ID_CT_REF_2
,replace(A.NOM_CT_REF_2,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NOM_CT_REF_2
,replace(A.TRABAJA_REF1,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TRABAJA_REF1
,replace(A.TRABAJA_REF2,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TRABAJA_REF2
,replace(A.TRAMITA_ID,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TRAMITA_ID
,replace(A.NUM_FOLIO,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NUM_FOLIO
,replace(A.REF1_CONFIRMADA_S_N,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS REF1_CONFIRMADA
,replace(A.REF2_CONFIRMADA_S_N,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS REF2_CONFIRMADA
,replace(A.FECHA_APORTACION,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS FECHA_APORTACION
,replace(A.IMPORTE_APORTACION,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS IMPORTE_APORTACION
,replace(A.CONTRATO,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS CONTRATO
,replace(A.USUARIO_ALTA,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS USUARIO_ALTA
,replace(A.PERIODO_NOMINAL,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS PERIODO_NOMINAL
,replace(A.CALIFICACION,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS CALIFICACION
,replace(A.SUCURSAL_CONFIRM,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS SUCURSAL_CONFIRM
,replace(A.FECHA_CONFIRM,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS FECHA_CONFIRM
,replace(A.LUGAR_NACIMIENTO,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS LUGAR_NACIMIENTO
,replace(A.NACIONALIDAD,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NACIONALIDAD
,replace(A.NIVEL_ESTUDIOS,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NIVEL_ESTUDIOS
,replace(A.USUARIO,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS USUARIO
,replace(A.OPERACION,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS OPERACION
,replace(A.TIMESTAMP,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TIMESTAMP_FILE
,replace(A.HORA,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS HORA
,replace(A.CTA_CLABE,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS CTA_CLABE
,replace(B.TZ_LOCK,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TZ_LOCK
,replace(B.CLIENTE_ID,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS CLIENTE_ID
,replace(B.TIPO,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TIPO
,replace(B.NOM_CALLE,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NOM_CALLE
,replace(B.ORDINAL,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS ORDINAL
,replace(B.NUM_EXT,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NUM_EXT
,replace(B.NUM_INT,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NUM_INT
,replace(B.REF_UBICA,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS REF_UBICA
,replace(B.COD_POSTAL,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS COD_POSTAL
,replace(B.CLAVE_COLONIA,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS CLAVE_COLONIA
,replace(B.TEL_FIJO_PAIS,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TEL_FIJO_PAIS
,replace(B.TEL_FIJO_AREA,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TEL_FIJO_AREA
,replace(B.TEL_FIJO_NUM,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TEL_FIJO_NUM
,replace(B.TEL_FIJO_EXT,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TEL_FIJO_EXT
,replace(B.TEL_2_CLIENTE_PAIS,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TEL2_CLIENTE_PAIS
,replace(B.TEL_2_CLIENTE_AREA,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TEL2_CLIENTE_AREA
,replace(B.TEL_2_CLIENTE,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TEL_2_CLIENTE
,replace(B.TEL_2_CLIENTE_EXT,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TEL_2_CLIENTE_EXT
,replace(B.TEL_CEL_PAIS,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TEL_CEL_PAIS
,replace(B.TEL_CEL_NUM,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TEL_CEL_NUM
,replace(B.EMAIL_CLIENTE,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS EMAIL_CLIENTE
,replace(B.SITIO_WEB_CLIENTE,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS SITIO_WEB_CLIENTE
,replace(B.FAX_PAIS,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS FAX_PAIS
,replace(B.FAX_AREA,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS FAX_AREA
,replace(B.FAX_NUM,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS FAX_NUM
,replace(B.FAX_EXT,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS FAX_EXT
,replace(B.CLAVE_MUNICIPIO,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS CLAVE_MUNICIPIO
,replace(B.CLAVE_ESTADO,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS CLAVE_ESTADO
,replace(B.NOMBRE_COLONIA,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NOMBRE_COLONIA
,replace(B.USUARIO,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS USUARIO
,replace(B.OPERACION,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS OPERACION
,replace(B.TIMESTAMP,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TIMESTAMP_FILEB
,replace(B.HORA,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS HORA
,replace(B.TIMESTAMP,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TIMESTAMP_FILEC
,replace(B.HORA,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS HORA2
,replace(F.CLIENTE_ID,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS CLIENTE_ID
,replace(F.CENTRO_TRABAJO_ID,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS CENTRO_TRABAJO_ID
,replace(F.FC_INGRESO_CT,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS FC_INGRESO_CT
,replace(F.FC_INGRESO_CT,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS FC_EGRESO_CT
,replace(F.PUESTO,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS PUESTO
,replace(F.IMPORTE_SALARIO,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS IMPORTE_SALARIO 
,replace(F.COMISIONISTA,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS COMISIONISTA
,replace(F.ESTATUS,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS ESTATUS_CON_CT
,replace(F.CENTRO_TRABAJO,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS CENTRO_TRABAJO
,replace(F.IMPORTE_DESCUENTO,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS IMPORTE_DESC
,replace(F.NUMERO_FONACOT_CT,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NUMERO_FONACOT
,replace(F.SALARIO_BASE,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS SALARIO_BASE
,replace(F.TIPO_SEGURIDAD_SOCIAL,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TIPO_SEG_SOCIAL
,replace(F.NUM_SEG_SOCIAL,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NUM_SEG_SOCIAL
,replace(F.FECHA_INGRESO_BASE,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS FECHA_INGRESO_BASE
,replace(F.FECHA_PROCESO_BAJA,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS FECHA_PROCESO_BAJA
,replace(C.NOMBRE_COLONIA,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NOMBRE_COLONIA
,replace(D.NOMBRE_MUNICIPIO,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NOMBRE_MUNICIPIO
,replace(E.NOMBRE_ESTADO,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NOMBRE_ESTADO
FROM TOPAZ.CL_CLIENTES A
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.CL_CLIENTES_DIR B ON A.CLIENTE_ID=B.CLIENTE_ID
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.TC_COLONIAS C ON B.CLAVE_COLONIA=C.CLAVE_COLONIA
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.TC_MUNICIPIOS D ON B.CLAVE_MUNICIPIO=D.CLAVE_MUNICIPIO
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.TC_ESTADOS E ON B.CLAVE_ESTADO=E.CLAVE_ESTADO 
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.CL_REL_CLIENTE_CT F ON A.CLIENTE_ID=F.CLIENTE_ID
WHERE A.TIPO_CLIENTE = '01'
AND B.TIPO=1
--AND A.NIVEL_ESTUDIOS >= 5
AND F.ESTATUS='A'
--AND A.SUCURSAL_ID IN (SELECT SUCURSAL_ID FROM TOPAZ.TC_SUCURSALES WHERE TZ_LOCK=0 AND ZONA_SUCURSAL=6)
AND B.EMAIL_CLIENTE IS NOT NULL;
--------------------------------------------------------------------
PARA CONOCER LOS GIROS ECONOMICOS DE LAS EMPRESAS

SELECT B.*,A.*,C.*,D.NOMBRE_COLONIA,E.NOMBRE_MUNICIPIO,F.NOMBRE_ESTADO
FROM TOPAZ.CL_PERSONAS_MORALES A
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.TC_GIROS B ON A.GIRO_ID=B.GIRO_ID
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.CL_CLIENTES_DIR C ON A.CLIENTE_ID=C.CLIENTE_ID
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.TC_COLONIAS D ON C.CLAVE_COLONIA=D.CLAVE_COLONIA
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.TC_MUNICIPIOS E ON C.CLAVE_MUNICIPIO=E.CLAVE_MUNICIPIO
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.TC_ESTADOS F ON C.CLAVE_ESTADO=F.CLAVE_ESTADO 
WHERE 
B.GIRO_ID IN (81,82)
AND C.TIPO=1
ORDER BY B.GIRO_ID,C.CLIENTE_ID;

-----------------------------------------------------------------------
Para conocer el historial de una tarjeta (estado y tramite)
SELECT 
    A.TZ_LOCK
   ,A.TRAMITE_ACTUAL || ' ' || D.TRAMITE AS TRAMITE_ACTUAL 
   ,A.TRAMITE_ANTES || ' ' || B.TRAMITE AS TRAMITE_ANTES
   ,A.ESTADO_ACTUAL || ' ' || C.ESTADO AS ESTADO_ACTUAL
   ,A.ESTADO_ANTES || ' ' || E.ESTADO AS ESTADO_ANTES
   ,A.FECHA
   ,A.CLAVE_USUARIO
   ,A.TARJETA
   ,A.SUCURSAL_ID
   ,A.FECHATRAMITEANT
   ,A.FECHAESTADOANT
   ,A.OBSERVACIONES
   ,A.CLAVE_USUARIO_TRAMITE_ANT
FROM TOPAZ.TF_HISTORICO_MARCAS A
LEFT JOIN FNT_ECRUCES.T_TRAMITE B ON A.TRAMITE_ANTES = B.ID_TRAMITE
LEFT JOIN FNT_ECRUCES.T_ESTADO C ON A.ESTADO_ACTUAL = C.ID_ESTADO
LEFT JOIN FNT_ECRUCES.T_TRAMITE D ON A.TRAMITE_ACTUAL = D.ID_TRAMITE
LEFT JOIN FNT_ECRUCES.T_ESTADO E ON A.ESTADO_ANTES = E.ID_ESTADO
                WHERE A.TZ_LOCK=0
                --AND A.TARJETA = '5498800087711579'
                AND A.TARJETA LIKE '53%'
                ORDER BY A.FECHA ASC;

-----------------------------------------------------------------------
PARA REVISAR EL CATALOGO DE GIRO GIROS

SELECT *
FROM TOPAZ.TC_GIROS
ORDER BY NOMBRE_GIRO;
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
PARA OBTENER LAS EMPRESAS FINANCIERAS

SELECT 
 B.TZ_LOCK
,B.GIRO_ID
,B.NOMBRE_GIRO
,B.SECTOR_ID
,B.SECTOR_RIESGO 
,A.TZ_LOCK
,A.CLIENTE_ID
,A.TIPO_CLIENTE
,A.TIPO_DOCUMENTO
,replace(A.NO_DOCUMENTO, chr(13) || chr(10),'') AS NO_DOCUMENTO
,replace(trim(A.NOMBRE_COMPLETO), chr(13) || chr(10),'') AS NOMBRE_COMPLETO
,A.TIPO_PERSONA_MORAL
,replace(trim(A.NOMBRE_COMERCIAL), chr(13) || chr(10),'') AS NOMBRE_COMERCIAL
,A.TIPO_ORGANISMO
,A.CASA_MATRIZ_ID
,A.GIRO_ID_EC
,A.NUM_REG_TRAB
,A.GIRO_ID
,A.GPO_CORPORATIVO_ID
,A.CERTIFICA_S_N
,A.FORMA_PAGO
,A.NO_TRABAJADORES
,A.SUCURSAL_ID
,A.PAGO_CENTRALIZADO
,A.SUCURSAL_PAGO_ID
,A.TECHO_FINANCIERO
,A.CAMARA_COM_ID
,A.CENTRAL_OBRERA_ID
,A.CODIGO_CAT
,A.PARTICIPA_DESC_PROMO
,A.SECTOR_NOTIF
,A.NOM_SUCURSAL
,A.CT_FONACOT_S_N
,A.TOT_EMP_SIND
,A.TOT_EMP_CONF
,A.TOT_EMP_EVEN
,A.FECHA_CONSTITUCION
,A.AFILIADO_NAFIN
,A.ALCANZA_METAS_VENTAS
,A.CUMPLE_MAX_OPERACIONES
,A.COMISION_ESPECIAL
,A.TECHO_UTILIZADO
,A.DIAS_ADICIONALES
,A.AFILIACION_MINIMA_CT
,A.OPERACION_AVI
,A.APOYO_COBRANZA
,A.INVERSION_PUBLICIDAD
,A.CANTIDAD_FACTURAS
,A.IMPORTE_FACTURAS
,A.FECHA_CAPTURA_DESC
,A.EJERCIMIENTO
,A.TIPO_EJERCIMIENTO
,A.FORMA_ENVIO_EJA
,A.ID_PROCESAR
,A.ACTIVO_PROCESAR
,A.DESCUENTO_COMISION
,A.TOT_EMP_PERM
,A.CALIFICACION_CT
,A.PUNTAJE_SECTOR_CT
,A.PUNTAJE_EMP_SAL_CT
,A.NIVEL_RIESGO_CT
,A.FECHA_ULTIMA_CALI
,A.APLICA_SEMAFORO
,A.GRACIA_CERTIFICACION
,A.CAMBIO_GIRO_EMP
,A.PUNTAJE_POR_CEDULA
,A.AFIL_MASIVA_TRAB
,A.CAPACIDAD_DESC_SOL
,C.TZ_LOCK
,C.CLIENTE_ID
,C.TIPO
,C.NOM_CALLE
,C.ORDINAL
,C.NUM_EXT
,C.NUM_INT
,C.REF_UBICA
,C.COD_POSTAL
,C.CLAVE_COLONIA
,C.TEL_FIJO_PAIS
,C.TEL_FIJO_AREA
,C.TEL_FIJO_NUM
,C.TEL_FIJO_EXT
,C.TEL_2_CLIENTE_PAIS
,C.TEL_2_CLIENTE_AREA
,C.TEL_2_CLIENTE
,C.TEL_2_CLIENTE_EXT
,C.TEL_CEL_PAIS
,C.TEL_CEL_NUM
,replace(C.EMAIL_CLIENTE, chr(13) || chr(10),'') AS EMAIL_CLIENTE
,replace(C.SITIO_WEB_CLIENTE, chr(13) || chr(10),'') AS SITIO_WEB_CLIENTE
,C.FAX_PAIS
,C.FAX_AREA
,C.FAX_NUM
,C.FAX_EXT
,C.CLAVE_MUNICIPIO
,C.CLAVE_ESTADO
,C.NOMBRE_COLONIA
,C.USUARIO
,C.OPERACION
,C.TIMESTAMP
,C.HORA
,D.NOMBRE_COLONIA
,E.NOMBRE_MUNICIPIO
,F.NOMBRE_ESTADO
FROM TOPAZ.CL_PERSONAS_MORALES A
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.TC_GIROS B ON A.GIRO_ID=B.GIRO_ID
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.CL_CLIENTES_DIR C ON A.CLIENTE_ID=C.CLIENTE_ID
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.TC_COLONIAS D ON C.CLAVE_COLONIA=D.CLAVE_COLONIA
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.TC_MUNICIPIOS E ON C.CLAVE_MUNICIPIO=E.CLAVE_MUNICIPIO
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.TC_ESTADOS F ON C.CLAVE_ESTADO=F.CLAVE_ESTADO 
WHERE 
B.GIRO_ID >=0--IN (81,82)--Financieros 81,82
AND C.TIPO>=0 --1
ORDER BY B.GIRO_ID,C.CLIENTE_ID,C.TIPO;
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
QUERY PARA INICIAR CONSULTA EXPORTACION CLIENTES

--CORRECTO CON LOS AS Y REPLACES BIEN--
------------------------------------------------------------------------
SELECT 
 replace(RTRIM(A.TIPO_CLIENTE),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TIPO_CLIENTE
,replace(RTRIM(A.TIPO_PERSONA),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TIPO_PERSONA
,replace(RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(A.NOMBRE_COMPLETO,'*',''))),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NOMBRE_COMPLETO
,replace(RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(A.NOMBRE_CORTO,'*',''))),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NOMBRE_CORTO
,replace(RTRIM(LTRIM(A.PRIMER_NOMBRE)),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS PRIMER_NOMBRE
,replace(RTRIM(LTRIM(A.SEGUNDO_NOMBRE)),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS SEGUNDO_NOMBRE
,replace(RTRIM(LTRIM(A.APELLIDO_PATERNO)),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS APELLIDO_PATERNO
,replace(RTRIM(LTRIM(A.APELLIDO_MATERNO)),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS APELLIDO_MATERNO
,replace(RTRIM(A.FECHA_NACIMIENTO),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS FECHA_NACIMIENTO
,replace(RTRIM(A.SEXO),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS SEXO
,replace(RTRIM(A.ESTADO_CIVIL),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS ESTADO_CIVIL
,replace(RTRIM(A.TIPO_VIVIENDA),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TIPO_VIVIENDA
,replace(A.NUM_ANIOS_HABITADA,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS ANIOS_HABITADA
,replace(A.NUM_PERSONAS_DEPEND,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NUM_PERS_DEPEND
,replace(A.IMPORTE_OTROS_INGRESOS,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS IMPORTE_OTROS_ING
,replace(A.NUM_PER_TRABAJAN,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NUM_PER_TRABAJAN
,replace(A.CREDITOS_CON,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS CREDITOS_CON
,replace(A.SUCURSAL_ID,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS SUCURSAL_ID
,replace(A.TRAMITA,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TRAMITA
,replace(A.STATUS,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS STATUS
,replace(A.ZONA_FRONTERIZA,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS ZONA_FRONTERIZA
,replace(A.COMO_SE_ENTERO,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS COMO_SE_ENTERO
,replace(A.COD_INTER_FINAN,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS COD_INTER_FINAN
,replace(A.COD_RESIDENCIA,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS COD_RESIDENCIA
,replace(A.SUB_DIV_INT_1,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS SUB_DIV_INT_1
,replace(A.SUB_DIV_INT_2,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS SUB_DIV_INT_2
,replace(A.SUB_DIV_INT_3,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS SUB_DIV_INT_3
,replace(A.ZONA_ECONOMICA,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS ZONA_ECONOMICA
,replace(A.FECHA_ALTA,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS FECHA_ALTA
,replace(A.FECHA_REACTIVACION,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS FECHA_REACTIVACION
,replace(A.FECHA_BAJA,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS FECHA_BAJA
,replace(A.TIPO_DOCUMENTO,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TIPO_DOCUMENTO
,replace(A.NUMERO_DOCUMENTO,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NUMERO_DOCUMENTO
,replace(A.NUMERO_FONACOT,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NUMERO_FONACOT
,replace(A.RFC,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS RFC
,replace(A.NUM_SEG_SOCIAL,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NUM_SEG_SOCIAL
,replace(A.CURP,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS CURP
,replace(A.TIPO_AFILIACION,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TIPO_AFILIACION
,replace(A.NOMBRE_CONYUGE,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NOMBRE_CONYUGE
,replace(A.TRABAJA_CONYUGE,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TRABAJA_CONYUGE
,replace(A.CT_CONYUGE,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS CT_CONYUGE
,replace(A.NOMBRE_REF1,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NOMBRE_REF1
,replace(A.PARENTESCO_REF1,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS PARENTESCO_REF1
,replace(A.NOMBRE_REF2,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NOMBRE_REF2
,replace(A.PARENTESCO_REF2,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS PARENTESCO_REF2
,replace(A.TIPO_SEGURIDAD_SOCIAL,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TIPO_SEG_SOCIAL
,replace(A.MESES_HABITADA,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS MESES_HABITADA
,replace(A.ID_CT_CONYUGE,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS ID_CT_CONYUGE
,replace(A.PLAZOS_DEFECTO,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS PLAZOS_DEFECTO
,replace(A.NOM_CT_REF_1,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NOM_CT_REF_1
,replace(A.ID_CT_REF_2,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS ID_CT_REF_2
,replace(A.NOM_CT_REF_2,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NOM_CT_REF_2
,replace(A.TRABAJA_REF1,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TRABAJA_REF1
,replace(A.TRABAJA_REF2,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TRABAJA_REF2
,replace(A.TRAMITA_ID,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TRAMITA_ID
,replace(A.NUM_FOLIO,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NUM_FOLIO
,replace(A.REF1_CONFIRMADA_S_N,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS REF1_CONFIRMADA
,replace(A.REF2_CONFIRMADA_S_N,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS REF2_CONFIRMADA
,replace(A.FECHA_APORTACION,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS FECHA_APORTACION
,replace(A.IMPORTE_APORTACION,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS IMPORTE_APORTACION
,replace(A.CONTRATO,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS CONTRATO
,replace(A.USUARIO_ALTA,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS USUARIO_ALTA
,replace(A.PERIODO_NOMINAL,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS PERIODO_NOMINAL
,replace(A.CALIFICACION,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS CALIFICACION
,replace(A.SUCURSAL_CONFIRM,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS SUCURSAL_CONFIRM
,replace(A.FECHA_CONFIRM,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS FECHA_CONFIRM
,replace(A.LUGAR_NACIMIENTO,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS LUGAR_NACIMIENTO
,replace(A.NACIONALIDAD,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NACIONALIDAD
,replace(A.NIVEL_ESTUDIOS,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NIVEL_ESTUDIOS
,replace(A.USUARIO,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS USUARIO
,replace(A.OPERACION,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS OPERACION
,replace(A.TIMESTAMP,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TIMESTAMP_FILE
,replace(A.HORA,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS HORA
,replace(A.CTA_CLABE,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS CTA_CLABE
,replace(B.TZ_LOCK,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TZ_LOCK
,replace(B.CLIENTE_ID,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS CLIENTE_ID
,replace(B.TIPO,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TIPO
,replace(B.NOM_CALLE,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NOM_CALLE
,replace(B.ORDINAL,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS ORDINAL
,replace(B.NUM_EXT,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NUM_EXT
,replace(B.NUM_INT,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NUM_INT
,replace(B.REF_UBICA,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS REF_UBICA
,replace(B.COD_POSTAL,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS COD_POSTAL
,replace(B.CLAVE_COLONIA,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS CLAVE_COLONIA
,replace(B.TEL_FIJO_PAIS,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TEL_FIJO_PAIS
,replace(B.TEL_FIJO_AREA,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TEL_FIJO_AREA
,replace(B.TEL_FIJO_NUM,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TEL_FIJO_NUM
,replace(B.TEL_FIJO_EXT,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TEL_FIJO_EXT
,replace(B.TEL_2_CLIENTE_PAIS,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TEL2_CLIENTE_PAIS
,replace(B.TEL_2_CLIENTE_AREA,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TEL2_CLIENTE_AREA
,replace(B.TEL_2_CLIENTE,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TEL_2_CLIENTE
,replace(B.TEL_2_CLIENTE_EXT,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TEL_2_CLIENTE_EXT
,replace(B.TEL_CEL_PAIS,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TEL_CEL_PAIS
,replace(B.TEL_CEL_NUM,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TEL_CEL_NUM
,replace(B.EMAIL_CLIENTE,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS EMAIL_CLIENTE
,replace(B.SITIO_WEB_CLIENTE,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS SITIO_WEB_CLIENTE
,replace(B.FAX_PAIS,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS FAX_PAIS
,replace(B.FAX_AREA,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS FAX_AREA
,replace(B.FAX_NUM,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS FAX_NUM
,replace(B.FAX_EXT,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS FAX_EXT
,replace(B.CLAVE_MUNICIPIO,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS CLAVE_MUNICIPIO
,replace(B.CLAVE_ESTADO,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS CLAVE_ESTADO
,replace(B.NOMBRE_COLONIA,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NOMBRE_COLONIA
,replace(B.USUARIO,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS USUARIO
,replace(B.OPERACION,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS OPERACION
,replace(B.TIMESTAMP,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TIMESTAMP_FILEB
,replace(B.HORA,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS HORA
,replace(B.TIMESTAMP,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TIMESTAMP_FILEC
,replace(B.HORA,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS HORA2
,replace(F.CLIENTE_ID,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS CLIENTE_ID
,replace(F.CENTRO_TRABAJO_ID,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS CENTRO_TRABAJO_ID
,replace(F.FC_INGRESO_CT,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS FC_INGRESO_CT
,replace(F.FC_INGRESO_CT,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS FC_EGRESO_CT
,replace(F.PUESTO,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS PUESTO
,replace(F.IMPORTE_SALARIO,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS IMPORTE_SALARIO 
,replace(F.COMISIONISTA,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS COMISIONISTA
,replace(F.ESTATUS,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS ESTATUS_CON_CT
,replace(F.CENTRO_TRABAJO,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS CENTRO_TRABAJO
,replace(F.IMPORTE_DESCUENTO,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS IMPORTE_DESC
,replace(F.NUMERO_FONACOT_CT,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NUMERO_FONACOT
,replace(F.SALARIO_BASE,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS SALARIO_BASE
,replace(F.TIPO_SEGURIDAD_SOCIAL,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TIPO_SEG_SOCIAL
,replace(F.NUM_SEG_SOCIAL,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NUM_SEG_SOCIAL
,replace(F.FECHA_INGRESO_BASE,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS FECHA_INGRESO_BASE
,replace(F.FECHA_PROCESO_BAJA,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS FECHA_PROCESO_BAJA
,replace(C.NOMBRE_COLONIA,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NOMBRE_COLONIA
,replace(D.NOMBRE_MUNICIPIO,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NOMBRE_MUNICIPIO
,replace(E.NOMBRE_ESTADO,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NOMBRE_ESTADO
FROM TOPAZ.CL_CLIENTES A
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.CL_CLIENTES_DIR B ON A.CLIENTE_ID=B.CLIENTE_ID
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.TC_COLONIAS C ON B.CLAVE_COLONIA=C.CLAVE_COLONIA
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.TC_MUNICIPIOS D ON B.CLAVE_MUNICIPIO=D.CLAVE_MUNICIPIO
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.TC_ESTADOS E ON B.CLAVE_ESTADO=E.CLAVE_ESTADO 
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.CL_REL_CLIENTE_CT F ON A.CLIENTE_ID=F.CLIENTE_ID
WHERE A.TZ_LOCK=0
--AND B.TZ_LOCK=0
--AND C.TZ_LOCK=0
--AND D.TZ_LOCK=0
--AND E.TZ_LOCK=0
--AND F.TZ_LOCK=0
AND A.CLIENTE_ID='1214991'
--AND A.TIPO_CLIENTE = '03'
ORDER BY A.TIPO_CLIENTE,A.CLIENTE_ID;
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
QUERY GODADDY CONSULTAS VISTOS

SELECT
       A.EMAIL AS EMAIL_VISTOS_12ENE2016
      ,A.FDATE AS FECHA_VISTOS_12ENE2016
      ,A.FCOUNT AS CONTEO_VISTOS_12ENE2016
      ,B.EMAIL AS EMAIL_ACTIVADOS_12ENE2016
      ,B.FDATE AS FECHA_ACTIVADOS_12ENE2016
      ,B.FCOUNT AS CONTEO_ACTIVADOS_12ENE2016
      --------------------------
      --,C.EMAIL AS EMAIL_VISTOS_14ENE2016
      ,C.FDATE AS FECHA_VISTOS_14ENE2016
      ,C.FCOUNT AS CONTEO_VISTOS_14ENE2016
      --,D.EMAIL AS EMAIL_ACTIVADOS_14ENE2016
      ,D.FDATE AS FECHA_ACTIVADOS_14ENE2016
      ,D.FCOUNT AS CONTEO_ACTIVADOS_14ENE2016  
      -------------------------
      --,E.EMAIL AS EMAIL_VISTOS_19ENE2016
      ,E.FDATE AS FECHA_VISTOS_19ENE2016
      ,E.FCOUNT AS CONTEO_VISTOS_19ENE2016
      --,F.EMAIL AS EMAIL_ACTIVADOS_19ENE2016
      ,F.FDATE AS FECHA_ACTIVADOS_19ENE2016
      ,F.FCOUNT AS CONTEO_ACTIVADOS_19ENE2016
      --------------------------
      ,G.EMAIL_CLIENTE
      --------------------------
      ,G.TEL_CEL_NUM
      ,G.TEL_FIJO_AREA
      ,G.TEL_FIJO_NUM
      ,G.TEL_FIJO_EXT
      ,G.NOM_CALLE
      ,G.NUM_EXT
      ,G.NUM_INT
      ,G.REF_UBICA
      ,G.COD_POSTAL
      ---------------------------
      ,H.NOMBRE_REPRESENTANTE
      ,H.PUESTO_REPRESENTANTE
      ---------------------------
      ,I.NOMBRE_COMPLETO AS RAZON_SOCIAL 
      ---------------------------
      ,J.NOMBRE_COLONIA
      ,K.NOMBRE_MUNICIPIO
      ,L.NOMBRE_ESTADO
      ---------------------------
      --,M.NOMBRE_COMPLETO
      --,M.GIRO_ID
      --,M.NO_TRABAJADORES
      ,M.TOT_EMP_SIND
      ,M.TOT_EMP_CONF
      ,M.TOT_EMP_EVEN
      ,(M.TOT_EMP_SIND+M.TOT_EMP_CONF+M.TOT_EMP_EVEN) AS TOT_EMPLEADOS
      ---------------------------
      ,N.NOMBRE_GIRO
FROM TMP_VISTOS_12ENE2016 A
FULL JOIN TMP_ACTIVADOS_12ENE2016 B ON A.EMAIL=B.EMAIL
FULL JOIN TMP_VISTOS_14ENE2016 C ON A.EMAIL=C.EMAIL
FULL JOIN TMP_ACTIVADOS_14ENE2016 D ON A.EMAIL=D.EMAIL
FULL JOIN TMP_VISTOS_19ENE2016 E ON A.EMAIL=E.EMAIL
FULL JOIN TMP_ACTIVADOS_19ENE2016 F ON A.EMAIL=F.EMAIL
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.CL_CLIENTES_DIR G ON A.EMAIL=G.EMAIL_CLIENTE
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.CL_REP_PERSONAS_MORALES H ON G.CLIENTE_ID=H.CLIENTE_ID
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.CL_CLIENTES I ON G.CLIENTE_ID=I.CLIENTE_ID
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.TC_COLONIAS J ON G.CLAVE_COLONIA=J.CLAVE_COLONIA
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.TC_MUNICIPIOS K ON G.CLAVE_MUNICIPIO=K.CLAVE_MUNICIPIO
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.TC_ESTADOS L ON G.CLAVE_ESTADO=L.CLAVE_ESTADO
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.CL_PERSONAS_MORALES M ON G.CLIENTE_ID=M.CLIENTE_ID
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.TC_GIROS N ON M.GIRO_ID=N.GIRO_ID
WHERE J.NOMBRE_COLONIA IS NOT NULL
--AND A.EMAIL='mcrodriguez@excelduc.org.mx'
--AND G.CLIENTE_ID=200456829
--ORDER BY A.FCOUNT DESC;
ORDER BY A.EMAIL;

---------------------------------------------------------------------
Obtener las tarjetas activas para Credimoto y Mujer

SELECT A.*
FROM TOPAZ.CL_TARJETAS A
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.TC_SUCURSALES B ON A.SUCURSAL=B.SUCURSAL_ID 
WHERE A.TZ_LOCK=0
AND A.TRAMITE=4
AND A.ESTADO=4
AND A.NROTARJETA LIKE '54988%' --54988=>CREDIMOTO --534641=>MUJER
AND A.FECHA_ALTA='02/10/15'
AND A.SUCURSAL=31
ORDER BY 1 DESC,4 DESC;
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Conocer el nombre de la base de datos Credere
select sys_context('userenv','db_name') from dual;

----------------------------------------------------------------------
Extractor para Personas Morales

SELECT 
 replace(RTRIM(A.TIPO_CLIENTE),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TIPO_CLIENTE
,replace(RTRIM(A.TIPO_PERSONA),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TIPO_PERSONA
,replace(RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(A.NOMBRE_COMPLETO,'*',''))),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NOMBRE_COMPLETO
--,replace(RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(A.NOMBRE_CORTO,'*',''))),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NOMBRE_CORTO
--,replace(RTRIM(LTRIM(A.PRIMER_NOMBRE)),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS PRIMER_NOMBRE
--,replace(RTRIM(LTRIM(A.SEGUNDO_NOMBRE)),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS SEGUNDO_NOMBRE
--,replace(RTRIM(LTRIM(A.APELLIDO_PATERNO)),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS APELLIDO_PATERNO
--,replace(RTRIM(LTRIM(A.APELLIDO_MATERNO)),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS APELLIDO_MATERNO
--,replace(RTRIM(A.FECHA_NACIMIENTO),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS FECHA_NACIMIENTO
--,replace(RTRIM(A.SEXO),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS SEXO
--,replace(RTRIM(A.ESTADO_CIVIL),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS ESTADO_CIVIL
--,replace(RTRIM(A.TIPO_VIVIENDA),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TIPO_VIVIENDA
--,replace(A.NUM_ANIOS_HABITADA,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS ANIOS_HABITADA
--,replace(A.NUM_PERSONAS_DEPEND,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NUM_PERS_DEPEND
--,replace(A.IMPORTE_OTROS_INGRESOS,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS IMPORTE_OTROS_ING
--,replace(A.NUM_PER_TRABAJAN,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NUM_PER_TRABAJAN
--,replace(A.CREDITOS_CON,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS CREDITOS_CON
,replace(A.SUCURSAL_ID,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS SUCURSAL_ID
,replace(A.TRAMITA,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TRAMITA
,replace(A.STATUS,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS STATUS
,replace(A.ZONA_FRONTERIZA,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS ZONA_FRONTERIZA
--,replace(A.COMO_SE_ENTERO,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS COMO_SE_ENTERO
--,replace(A.COD_INTER_FINAN,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS COD_INTER_FINAN
--,replace(A.COD_RESIDENCIA,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS COD_RESIDENCIA
--,replace(A.SUB_DIV_INT_1,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS SUB_DIV_INT_1
--,replace(A.SUB_DIV_INT_2,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS SUB_DIV_INT_2
--,replace(A.SUB_DIV_INT_3,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS SUB_DIV_INT_3
,replace(A.ZONA_ECONOMICA,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS ZONA_ECONOMICA
,replace(A.FECHA_ALTA,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS FECHA_ALTA
,replace(A.FECHA_REACTIVACION,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS FECHA_REACTIVACION
,replace(A.FECHA_BAJA,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS FECHA_BAJA
,replace(A.TIPO_DOCUMENTO,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TIPO_DOCUMENTO
,replace(A.NUMERO_DOCUMENTO,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NUMERO_DOCUMENTO
,replace(A.NUMERO_FONACOT,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NUMERO_FONACOT
,replace(A.RFC,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS RFC
,replace(A.NUM_SEG_SOCIAL,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NUM_SEG_SOCIAL
,replace(A.CURP,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS CURP
,replace(A.TIPO_AFILIACION,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TIPO_AFILIACION
--,replace(A.NOMBRE_CONYUGE,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NOMBRE_CONYUGE
--,replace(A.TRABAJA_CONYUGE,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TRABAJA_CONYUGE
--,replace(A.CT_CONYUGE,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS CT_CONYUGE
--,replace(A.NOMBRE_REF1,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NOMBRE_REF1
--,replace(A.PARENTESCO_REF1,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS PARENTESCO_REF1
--,replace(A.NOMBRE_REF2,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NOMBRE_REF2
--,replace(A.PARENTESCO_REF2,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS PARENTESCO_REF2
,replace(A.TIPO_SEGURIDAD_SOCIAL,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TIPO_SEG_SOCIAL
--,replace(A.MESES_HABITADA,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS MESES_HABITADA
--,replace(A.ID_CT_CONYUGE,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS ID_CT_CONYUGE
--,replace(A.PLAZOS_DEFECTO,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS PLAZOS_DEFECTO
--,replace(A.NOM_CT_REF_1,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NOM_CT_REF_1
--,replace(A.ID_CT_REF_2,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS ID_CT_REF_2
--,replace(A.NOM_CT_REF_2,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NOM_CT_REF_2
--,replace(A.TRABAJA_REF1,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TRABAJA_REF1
--,replace(A.TRABAJA_REF2,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TRABAJA_REF2
,replace(A.TRAMITA_ID,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TRAMITA_ID
,replace(A.NUM_FOLIO,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NUM_FOLIO
,replace(A.REF1_CONFIRMADA_S_N,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS REF1_CONFIRMADA
,replace(A.REF2_CONFIRMADA_S_N,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS REF2_CONFIRMADA
--,replace(A.FECHA_APORTACION,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS FECHA_APORTACION
,replace(A.IMPORTE_APORTACION,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS IMPORTE_APORTACION
,replace(A.CONTRATO,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS CONTRATO
,replace(A.USUARIO_ALTA,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS USUARIO_ALTA
,replace(A.PERIODO_NOMINAL,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS PERIODO_NOMINAL
,replace(A.CALIFICACION,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS CALIFICACION
,replace(A.SUCURSAL_CONFIRM,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS SUCURSAL_CONFIRM
,replace(A.FECHA_CONFIRM,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS FECHA_CONFIRM
--,replace(A.LUGAR_NACIMIENTO,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS LUGAR_NACIMIENTO
--,replace(A.NACIONALIDAD,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NACIONALIDAD
--,replace(A.NIVEL_ESTUDIOS,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NIVEL_ESTUDIOS
,replace(A.USUARIO,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS USUARIO
,replace(A.OPERACION,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS OPERACION
,replace(A.TIMESTAMP,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TIMESTAMP_FILE
,replace(A.HORA,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS HORA
,replace(A.CTA_CLABE,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS CTA_CLABE
,replace(B.TZ_LOCK,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TZ_LOCK
,replace(B.CLIENTE_ID,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS CLIENTE_ID
,replace(B.TIPO,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TIPO
,replace(B.NOM_CALLE,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NOM_CALLE
,replace(B.ORDINAL,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS ORDINAL
,replace(B.NUM_EXT,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NUM_EXT
,replace(B.NUM_INT,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NUM_INT
,replace(B.REF_UBICA,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS REF_UBICA
,replace(B.COD_POSTAL,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS COD_POSTAL
,replace(B.CLAVE_COLONIA,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS CLAVE_COLONIA
,replace(B.TEL_FIJO_PAIS,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TEL_FIJO_PAIS
,replace(B.TEL_FIJO_AREA,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TEL_FIJO_AREA
,replace(B.TEL_FIJO_NUM,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TEL_FIJO_NUM
,replace(B.TEL_FIJO_EXT,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TEL_FIJO_EXT
,replace(B.TEL_2_CLIENTE_PAIS,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TEL2_CLIENTE_PAIS
,replace(B.TEL_2_CLIENTE_AREA,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TEL2_CLIENTE_AREA
,replace(B.TEL_2_CLIENTE,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TEL_2_CLIENTE
,replace(B.TEL_2_CLIENTE_EXT,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TEL_2_CLIENTE_EXT
,replace(B.TEL_CEL_PAIS,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TEL_CEL_PAIS
,replace(B.TEL_CEL_NUM,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TEL_CEL_NUM
,replace(B.EMAIL_CLIENTE,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS EMAIL_CLIENTE
,replace(B.SITIO_WEB_CLIENTE,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS SITIO_WEB_CLIENTE
,replace(B.FAX_PAIS,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS FAX_PAIS
,replace(B.FAX_AREA,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS FAX_AREA
,replace(B.FAX_NUM,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS FAX_NUM
,replace(B.FAX_EXT,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS FAX_EXT
,replace(B.CLAVE_MUNICIPIO,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS CLAVE_MUNICIPIO
,replace(B.CLAVE_ESTADO,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS CLAVE_ESTADO
--,replace(B.NOMBRE_COLONIA,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NOMBRE_COLONIA
--,replace(B.USUARIO,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS USUARIO
--,replace(B.OPERACION,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS OPERACION
--,replace(B.TIMESTAMP,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TIMESTAMP_FILEB
--,replace(B.HORA,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS HORA
--,replace(B.TIMESTAMP,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TIMESTAMP_FILEC
--,replace(B.HORA,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS HORA2
--,replace(F.CLIENTE_ID,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS CLIENTE_ID
--,replace(F.CENTRO_TRABAJO_ID,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS CENTRO_TRABAJO_ID
--,replace(F.FC_INGRESO_CT,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS FC_INGRESO_CT
--,replace(F.FC_INGRESO_CT,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS FC_EGRESO_CT
--,replace(F.PUESTO,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS PUESTO
--,replace(F.IMPORTE_SALARIO,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS IMPORTE_SALARIO 
--,replace(F.COMISIONISTA,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS COMISIONISTA
--,replace(F.ESTATUS,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS ESTATUS_CON_CT
--,replace(F.CENTRO_TRABAJO,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS CENTRO_TRABAJO
--,replace(F.IMPORTE_DESCUENTO,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS IMPORTE_DESC
--,replace(F.NUMERO_FONACOT_CT,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NUMERO_FONACOT
--,replace(F.SALARIO_BASE,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS SALARIO_BASE
--,replace(F.TIPO_SEGURIDAD_SOCIAL,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TIPO_SEG_SOCIAL
--,replace(F.NUM_SEG_SOCIAL,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NUM_SEG_SOCIAL
--,replace(F.FECHA_INGRESO_BASE,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS FECHA_INGRESO_BASE
,replace(F.FECHA_PROCESO_BAJA,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS FECHA_PROCESO_BAJA
,replace(C.NOMBRE_COLONIA,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NOMBRE_COLONIA
,replace(D.NOMBRE_MUNICIPIO,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NOMBRE_MUNICIPIO
,replace(E.NOMBRE_ESTADO,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NOMBRE_ESTADO
FROM TOPAZ.CL_CLIENTES A
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.CL_CLIENTES_DIR B ON A.CLIENTE_ID=B.CLIENTE_ID
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.TC_COLONIAS C ON B.CLAVE_COLONIA=C.CLAVE_COLONIA
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.TC_MUNICIPIOS D ON B.CLAVE_MUNICIPIO=D.CLAVE_MUNICIPIO
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.TC_ESTADOS E ON B.CLAVE_ESTADO=E.CLAVE_ESTADO 
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.CL_REL_CLIENTE_CT F ON A.CLIENTE_ID=F.CLIENTE_ID
WHERE A.TZ_LOCK=0
--AND B.TZ_LOCK=0
--AND C.TZ_LOCK=0
--AND D.TZ_LOCK=0
--AND E.TZ_LOCK=0
--AND F.TZ_LOCK=0
--AND A.CLIENTE_ID='500005377'--Moral   --'1214991'=Fisica
AND A.TIPO_CLIENTE = '02'
AND B.TIPO='1'
AND B.EMAIL_CLIENTE IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY A.TIPO_CLIENTE,A.CLIENTE_ID;

--------------------------------------------------------------------
SELECCIONAR CLIENTES VBS (Versión Correcta y Corta)

SELECT 
replace(TRIM(A.TIPO_CLIENTE),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TIPO_CLIENTE 
,replace(TRIM(B.TIPO),chr(13) || chr(10), '') as TIPO 
,replace(TRIM(replace(A.NOMBRE_COMPLETO,'*','')),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NOMBRE_COMPLETO 
,replace(TRIM(A.NUM_SEG_SOCIAL),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NUM_SEG_SOCIAL 
,replace(TRIM(B.TEL_CEL_NUM),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TEL_CEL_NUM 
,replace(TRIM(B.TEL_FIJO_AREA),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TEL_FIJO_AREA 
,replace(TRIM(B.TEL_FIJO_NUM),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TEL_FIJO_NUM 
,replace(TRIM(replace(B.NOM_CALLE,'*','')),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NOM_CALLE 
,replace(TRIM(B.ORDINAL),chr(13) || chr(10), '') as ORDINAL 
,replace(B.NUM_EXT,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NUM_EXT 
,replace(B.NUM_INT,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NUM_INT 
,replace(TRIM(replace(B.REF_UBICA,'*','')),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS REF_UBICA
,replace(B.COD_POSTAL,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS COD_POSTAL 
,replace(TRIM(B.EMAIL_CLIENTE),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS EMAIL_CLIENTE 
,replace(TRIM(C.NOMBRE_COLONIA),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NOMBRE_COLONIA_B 
,replace(TRIM(D.NOMBRE_MUNICIPIO),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NOMBRE_MUNICIPIO 
,replace(TRIM(E.NOMBRE_ESTADO),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NOMBRE_ESTADO 
FROM TOPAZ.CL_CLIENTES A 
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.CL_CLIENTES_DIR B ON A.CLIENTE_ID=B.CLIENTE_ID 
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.TC_COLONIAS C ON B.CLAVE_COLONIA=C.CLAVE_COLONIA 
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.TC_MUNICIPIOS D ON B.CLAVE_MUNICIPIO=D.CLAVE_MUNICIPIO 
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.TC_ESTADOS E ON B.CLAVE_ESTADO=E.CLAVE_ESTADO 
WHERE B.EMAIL_CLIENTE IS NOT NULL 
AND A.CLIENTE_ID IN ('287634','344012','411057','465524','576926','1214991','114563') 
AND A.TIPO_CLIENTE in ('01','02','03','04') AND B.TIPO ='1' 
ORDER BY A.TIPO_CLIENTE,A.CLIENTE_ID;

--------------------------------------------------------------------
Clientes Personas Morales (versión correcta 09Ene2018)

SELECT 
 RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.TIPO_CLIENTE,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS TIPO_CLIENTE
--,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(B.TIPO,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS TIPO
,case
       WHEN B.TIPO = 1 THEN '1 CLIENT'
       WHEN B.TIPO = 2 THEN '2 CTCONY'
       WHEN B.TIPO = 3 THEN '3 REFER1' 
       WHEN B.TIPO = 4 THEN '4 REFER2'
       WHEN B.TIPO = 5 THEN '5 CTREF1'
       WHEN B.TIPO = 6 THEN '6 CTREF2'
       WHEN B.TIPO = 7 THEN '7 REPRES'
       ELSE 'X OTRO'
    end as TIPO
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.CLIENTE_ID,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS CLIENTE_ID
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.TIPO_PERSONA,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS TIPO_PERSONA
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.NOMBRE_COMPLETO,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS NOMBRE_COMPLETO
--,replace(RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(A.NOMBRE_CORTO,'*',''))),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NOMBRE_CORTO
--,replace(RTRIM(LTRIM(A.PRIMER_NOMBRE)),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS PRIMER_NOMBRE
--,replace(RTRIM(LTRIM(A.SEGUNDO_NOMBRE)),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS SEGUNDO_NOMBRE
--,replace(RTRIM(LTRIM(A.APELLIDO_PATERNO)),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS APELLIDO_PATERNO
--,replace(RTRIM(LTRIM(A.APELLIDO_MATERNO)),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS APELLIDO_MATERNO
--,replace(RTRIM(A.FECHA_NACIMIENTO),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS FECHA_NACIMIENTO
--,replace(RTRIM(A.SEXO),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS SEXO
--,replace(RTRIM(A.ESTADO_CIVIL),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS ESTADO_CIVIL
--,replace(RTRIM(A.TIPO_VIVIENDA),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TIPO_VIVIENDA
--,replace(A.NUM_ANIOS_HABITADA,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS ANIOS_HABITADA
--,replace(A.NUM_PERSONAS_DEPEND,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NUM_PERS_DEPEND
--,replace(A.IMPORTE_OTROS_INGRESOS,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS IMPORTE_OTROS_ING
--,replace(A.NUM_PER_TRABAJAN,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NUM_PER_TRABAJAN
--,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.CREDITOS_CON,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS CREDITOS_CON
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.SUCURSAL_ID || ' ' || J.NOMBRE_SUCURSAL,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS SUCURSAL
--,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.TRAMITA,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS TRAMITA
--,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.STATUS,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS STATUS
,case
       WHEN A.STATUS = 0 THEN '0 PORAUTORIZ'
       WHEN A.STATUS = 1 THEN '1 ACTIVO'
       WHEN A.STATUS = 2 THEN '2 SUSPENDIDO'
       WHEN A.STATUS = 3 THEN '3 EXTRAJUDIC'
       WHEN A.STATUS = 4 THEN '4 QUIEBRA'
       WHEN A.STATUS = 5 THEN '5 HUELGA'
       WHEN A.STATUS = 6 THEN '6 D.JUDICIAL'
       WHEN A.STATUS = 7 THEN '7 FALT DPAGO'
       WHEN A.STATUS = 8 THEN '8 ILOCALIZAB'
       WHEN A.STATUS = 9 THEN '9 BAJAPERMAN'
       WHEN A.STATUS = 10 THEN '10 SOLORECUP'
       WHEN A.STATUS = 11 THEN '11 REACTIVAC'
       WHEN A.STATUS = 12 THEN '12 BAJA OPER'
       WHEN A.STATUS = 13 THEN '13 BAJAPETIC.DIRECTOR'
       WHEN A.STATUS = 14 THEN '14 BAJADEPURA COBRZ'
       WHEN A.STATUS = 15 THEN '15 BAJA NO EJERC CRED'
       WHEN A.STATUS = 16 THEN '16 RENUENTE'
       WHEN A.STATUS = 17 THEN '17 PARA AUTORIZ'
       WHEN A.STATUS = 18 THEN '18 PARA AUTORIZ DIREC'
       WHEN A.STATUS = 19 THEN '19 RECHAZADO'
       WHEN A.STATUS = 20 THEN '20 CEDUL SNPAGO 31DIAS'
       WHEN A.STATUS = 21 THEN '21 PAGO MENOR 90XCIENT'
       WHEN A.STATUS = 22 THEN '22 NO CUMPLE ANTIGUED'
       WHEN A.STATUS = 23 THEN '23 CONSULT DESFAV BURO'
       WHEN A.STATUS = 24 THEN '24 NUEVA CONSULT FAVORAB BURO'
       WHEN A.STATUS = 25 THEN '25 SINDOCS SOLO RECUP'
       WHEN A.STATUS = 30 THEN '30 AFIL MICROSITIO'
       WHEN A.STATUS = 88 THEN '88 PERIODO D GRACIA'
       ELSE LTRIM(A.STATUS)
    end as TIPO
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.ZONA_FRONTERIZA,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS ZONA_FRONTERIZA
--,replace(A.COMO_SE_ENTERO,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS COMO_SE_ENTERO
--,replace(A.COD_INTER_FINAN,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS COD_INTER_FINAN
--,replace(A.COD_RESIDENCIA,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS COD_RESIDENCIA
--,replace(A.SUB_DIV_INT_1,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS SUB_DIV_INT_1
--,replace(A.SUB_DIV_INT_2,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS SUB_DIV_INT_2
--,replace(A.SUB_DIV_INT_3,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS SUB_DIV_INT_3
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.ZONA_ECONOMICA,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS ZONA_ECONOMICA
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(TO_CHAR(A.FECHA_ALTA,'DD/MM/YYYY'),'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS FECHA_ALTA
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(TO_CHAR(A.FECHA_REACTIVACION,'DD/MM/YYYY'),'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS FECHA_REACTIVACION
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(TO_CHAR(A.FECHA_BAJA,'DD/YY/YYYY'),'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS FECHA_BAJA
--,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.TIPO_DOCUMENTO,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS TIPO_DOCUMENTO
--,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.NUMERO_DOCUMENTO,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS NUMERO_DOCUMENTO
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.NUMERO_FONACOT,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS NUMERO_FONACOT
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.RFC,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS RFC
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.NUM_SEG_SOCIAL,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS NUM_SEG_SOCIAL

,case
       WHEN A.TIPO_AFILIACION = 'I' THEN 'I INTERNET'
       WHEN A.TIPO_AFILIACION = 'S' THEN 'S SOLICITU'
       WHEN A.TIPO_AFILIACION = 'T' THEN 'T TARJETAS' 
       ELSE 'X OTRO'
 end as TIPO_AFILIACION
