,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(H.TOT_EMP_CONF,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS TOT_EMP_CONF_H
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(H.TOT_EMP_EVEN,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS TOT_EMP_EVEN_H
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(TO_CHAR(H.FECHA_CONSTITUCION,'DD/MM/YYYY'),'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS FECHA_CONSTITUCION_H
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(C.NOMBRE_COLONIA,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS NOMBRE_COLONIA_C
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(D.NOMBRE_MUNICIPIO,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS NOMBRE_MUNICIPIO
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(E.NOMBRE_ESTADO,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS NOMBRE_ESTADO
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
FROM TOPAZ.CL_CLIENTES A
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.CL_CLIENTES_DIR B ON A.CLIENTE_ID=B.CLIENTE_ID
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.TC_COLONIAS C ON B.CLAVE_COLONIA=C.CLAVE_COLONIA
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.TC_MUNICIPIOS D ON B.CLAVE_MUNICIPIO=D.CLAVE_MUNICIPIO
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.TC_ESTADOS E ON B.CLAVE_ESTADO=E.CLAVE_ESTADO 
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.CL_REL_CLIENTE_CT F ON A.CLIENTE_ID=F.CLIENTE_ID
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.CL_REP_PERSONAS_MORALES G ON A.CLIENTE_ID=G.CLIENTE_ID
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.CL_PERSONAS_MORALES H ON A.CLIENTE_ID=H.CLIENTE_ID
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.TC_GIROS I ON H.GIRO_ID=I.GIRO_ID
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.TC_SUCURSALES J ON A.SUCURSAL_ID=J.SUCURSAL_ID
--LEFT JOIN DWH.CAT_TIPOIDENTI G ON A.TIPO_DOCUMENTO=G.DESCRIPCION
WHERE A.TZ_LOCK=0
--AND B.TZ_LOCK=0
--AND C.TZ_LOCK=0
--AND D.TZ_LOCK=0
--AND E.TZ_LOCK=0
--AND F.TZ_LOCK=0
--AND A.CLIENTE_ID='2837469'--Moral   --'1214991'=Fisica
--AND A.CLIENTE_ID IN ('500005377','1214991','423941','3127933','3127958','3127961','201020544','3194962')--Moral   --'1214991'=Fisica
AND A.TIPO_CLIENTE IN ('02','03','04')
AND B.TIPO <> '8'
AND B.TIPO='1'
AND B.EMAIL_CLIENTE IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY A.TIPO_CLIENTE,A.CLIENTE_ID;

--------------------------------------------------------------------
Clientes Personas Físicas (versión correcta xx/xx/xxxx)


SELECT 
 RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.TIPO_CLIENTE,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS TIPO_CLIENTE
--,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(B.TIPO,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS TIPO
,case
       WHEN B.TIPO = 1 THEN '1 CLIENT'
       WHEN B.TIPO = 2 THEN '2 CTCONY'
       WHEN B.TIPO = 3 THEN '3 REFER1' 
       WHEN B.TIPO = 4 THEN '4 REFER2'
       WHEN B.TIPO = 5 THEN '5 CTREF1'
       WHEN B.TIPO = 6 THEN '6 CTREF2'
       WHEN B.TIPO = 7 THEN '7 REPRES'
       ELSE 'X OTRO'
    end as TIPO
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.CLIENTE_ID,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS CLIENTE_ID
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.TIPO_PERSONA,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS TIPO_PERSONA
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.NOMBRE_COMPLETO,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS NOMBRE_COMPLETO
--,replace(RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(A.NOMBRE_CORTO,'*',''))),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NOMBRE_CORTO
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.PRIMER_NOMBRE,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS PRIMER_NOMBRE
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.SEGUNDO_NOMBRE,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS SEGUNDO_NOMBRE
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.APELLIDO_PATERNO,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS APELLIDO_PATERNO
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.APELLIDO_MATERNO,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS APELLIDO_MATERNO
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.FECHA_NACIMIENTO,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS FECHA_NACIMIENTO
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.SEXO,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS SEXO
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.ESTADO_CIVIL,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS ESTADO_CIVIL
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.TIPO_VIVIENDA,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS TIPO_VIVIENDA
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.NUM_ANIOS_HABITADA,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS NUM_ANIOS_HABITADA
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.NUM_PERSONAS_DEPEND,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS NUM_PERSONAS_DEPEND
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.IMPORTE_OTROS_INGRESOS,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS IMPORTE_OTROS_INGRESOS
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.NUM_PER_TRABAJAN,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS NUM_PER_TRABAJAN
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.CREDITOS_CON,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS CREDITOS_CON
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.SUCURSAL_ID || ' ' || J.NOMBRE_SUCURSAL,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS SUCURSAL
--,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.TRAMITA,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS TRAMITA
--,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.STATUS,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS STATUS
,case
       WHEN A.STATUS = 0 THEN '0 PORAUTORIZ'
       WHEN A.STATUS = 1 THEN '1 ACTIVO'
       WHEN A.STATUS = 2 THEN '2 SUSPENDIDO'
       WHEN A.STATUS = 3 THEN '3 EXTRAJUDIC'
       WHEN A.STATUS = 4 THEN '4 QUIEBRA'
       WHEN A.STATUS = 5 THEN '5 HUELGA'
       WHEN A.STATUS = 6 THEN '6 D.JUDICIAL'
       WHEN A.STATUS = 7 THEN '7 FALT DPAGO'
       WHEN A.STATUS = 8 THEN '8 ILOCALIZAB'
       WHEN A.STATUS = 9 THEN '9 BAJAPERMAN'
       WHEN A.STATUS = 10 THEN '10 SOLORECUP'
       WHEN A.STATUS = 11 THEN '11 REACTIVAC'
       WHEN A.STATUS = 12 THEN '12 BAJA OPER'
       WHEN A.STATUS = 13 THEN '13 BAJAPETIC.DIRECTOR'
       WHEN A.STATUS = 14 THEN '14 BAJADEPURA COBRZ'
       WHEN A.STATUS = 15 THEN '15 BAJA NO EJERC CRED'
       WHEN A.STATUS = 16 THEN '16 RENUENTE'
       WHEN A.STATUS = 17 THEN '17 PARA AUTORIZ'
       WHEN A.STATUS = 18 THEN '18 PARA AUTORIZ DIREC'
       WHEN A.STATUS = 19 THEN '19 RECHAZADO'
       WHEN A.STATUS = 20 THEN '20 CEDUL SNPAGO 31DIAS'
       WHEN A.STATUS = 21 THEN '21 PAGO MENOR 90XCIENT'
       WHEN A.STATUS = 22 THEN '22 NO CUMPLE ANTIGUED'
       WHEN A.STATUS = 23 THEN '23 CONSULT DESFAV BURO'
       WHEN A.STATUS = 24 THEN '24 NUEVA CONSULT FAVORAB BURO'
       WHEN A.STATUS = 25 THEN '25 SINDOCS SOLO RECUP'
       WHEN A.STATUS = 30 THEN '30 AFIL MICROSITIO'
       WHEN A.STATUS = 88 THEN '88 PERIODO D GRACIA'
       ELSE LTRIM(A.STATUS)
    end as TIPO
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.ZONA_FRONTERIZA,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS ZONA_FRONTERIZA
--,replace(A.COMO_SE_ENTERO,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS COMO_SE_ENTERO
--,replace(A.COD_INTER_FINAN,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS COD_INTER_FINAN
--,replace(A.COD_RESIDENCIA,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS COD_RESIDENCIA
--,replace(A.SUB_DIV_INT_1,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS SUB_DIV_INT_1
--,replace(A.SUB_DIV_INT_2,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS SUB_DIV_INT_2
--,replace(A.SUB_DIV_INT_3,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS SUB_DIV_INT_3
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.ZONA_ECONOMICA,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS ZONA_ECONOMICA
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(TO_CHAR(A.FECHA_ALTA,'DD/MM/YYYY'),'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS FECHA_ALTA
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(TO_CHAR(A.FECHA_REACTIVACION,'DD/MM/YYYY'),'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS FECHA_REACTIVACION
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(TO_CHAR(A.FECHA_BAJA,'DD/YY/YYYY'),'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS FECHA_BAJA
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.TIPO_DOCUMENTO,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS TIPO_DOCUMENTO
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.NUMERO_DOCUMENTO,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS NUMERO_DOCUMENTO
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.NUMERO_FONACOT,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS NUMERO_FONACOT
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.RFC,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS RFC
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.NUM_SEG_SOCIAL,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS NUM_SEG_SOCIAL
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.CURP,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS CURP
--,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.TIPO_AFILIACION,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS TIPO_AFILIACION
,case
       WHEN A.TIPO_AFILIACION = 'I' THEN 'I INTERNET'
       WHEN A.TIPO_AFILIACION = 'S' THEN 'S SOLICITU'
       WHEN A.TIPO_AFILIACION = 'T' THEN 'T TARJETAS' 
       ELSE 'X OTRO'
 end as TIPO_AFILIACION
--,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.TIPO_SEGURIDAD_SOCIAL,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS TIPO_SEGURIDAD_SOCIAL
,case
       WHEN A.TIPO_SEGURIDAD_SOCIAL = 1 THEN '1 IMSS'
       WHEN A.TIPO_SEGURIDAD_SOCIAL = 2 THEN '2 ISSSTE FEDER'
       WHEN A.TIPO_SEGURIDAD_SOCIAL = 3 THEN '3 ISSSTE LOCAL'
       WHEN A.TIPO_SEGURIDAD_SOCIAL = 4 THEN '4 OTRO'
       ELSE 'X NO CLASIF'
 end as TIPO_SEGURIDAD_SOCIAL
--,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.MESES_HABITADA,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS MESES_HABITADA
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.ID_CT_CONYUGE,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS ID_CT_CONYUGE
--,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.PLAZOS_DEFECTO,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS PLAZOS_DEFECTO
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.NOM_CT_REF_1,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS NOM_CT_REF_1
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.ID_CT_REF_2,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS ID_CT_REF_2
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.NOM_CT_REF_2,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS NOM_CT_REF_2
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.TRABAJA_REF1,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS TRABAJA_REF1
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.TRABAJA_REF2,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS TRABAJA_REF2
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.TRAMITA_ID,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS TRAMITA_ID
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.NUM_FOLIO,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS NUM_FOLIO
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.REF1_CONFIRMADA_S_N,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS REF1_CONFIRMADA_S_N
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.REF2_CONFIRMADA_S_N,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS REF2_CONFIRMADA_S_N
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.FECHA_APORTACION,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS FECHA_APORTACION
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.IMPORTE_APORTACION,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS IMPORTE_APORTACION
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.CONTRATO,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS CONTRATO
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.USUARIO_ALTA,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS USUARIO_ALTA
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.PERIODO_NOMINAL,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS PERIODO_NOMINAL
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.CALIFICACION,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS CALIFICACION
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.SUCURSAL_CONFIRM,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS SUCURSAL_CONFIRM
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(TO_CHAR(A.FECHA_CONFIRM,'DD/MM/YYYY'),'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS FECHA_CONFIRM
,replace(A.NOMBRE_CONYUGE,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NOMBRE_CONYUGE
,replace(A.TRABAJA_CONYUGE,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TRABAJA_CONYUGE
,replace(A.CT_CONYUGE,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS CT_CONYUGE
,replace(A.NOMBRE_REF1,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NOMBRE_REF1
,replace(A.PARENTESCO_REF1,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS PARENTESCO_REF1
,replace(A.NOMBRE_REF2,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NOMBRE_REF2
,replace(A.PARENTESCO_REF2,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS PARENTESCO_REF2
,replace(A.LUGAR_NACIMIENTO,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS LUGAR_NACIMIENTO
,replace(A.NACIONALIDAD,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NACIONALIDAD
,replace(A.NIVEL_ESTUDIOS,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NIVEL_ESTUDIOS
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.PERIODO_NOMINAL,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS PERIODO_NOMINAL
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.CALIFICACION,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS CALIFICACION
--,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.SUCURSAL_CONFIRM,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS SUCURSAL_CONFIRM
--,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.FECHA_CONFIRM,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS FECHA_CONFIRM
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.USUARIO,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS USUARIO
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.OPERACION,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS OPERACION
--,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.TIMESTAMP,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS TIMESTAMP_FILE
--,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.HORA,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS HORA
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.CTA_CLABE,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS CTA_CLABE
--,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.CLIENTE_ID,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS CLIENTE_ID
--,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(B.TIPO,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS TIPO
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(B.NOM_CALLE,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS NOM_CALLE
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(B.ORDINAL,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS ORDINAL
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(B.NUM_EXT,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS NUM_EXT
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(B.NUM_INT,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS NUM_INT
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(B.REF_UBICA,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS REF_UBICA
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(B.COD_POSTAL,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS COD_POSTAL
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(B.CLAVE_COLONIA,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS CLAVE_COLONIA
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(C.NOMBRE_COLONIA,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS NOMBRE_COLONIA
--,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(B.TEL_FIJO_PAIS,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS TEL_FIJO_PAIS
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(B.TEL_FIJO_AREA,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS TEL_FIJO_AREA
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(B.TEL_FIJO_NUM,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS TEL_FIJO_NUM
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(B.TEL_FIJO_EXT,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS TEL_FIJO_EXT
--,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(B.TEL_2_CLIENTE_PAIS,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS TEL2_CLIENTE_PAIS
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(B.TEL_2_CLIENTE_AREA,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS TEL2_CLIENTE_AREA
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(B.TEL_2_CLIENTE,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS TEL_2_CLIENTE
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(B.TEL_2_CLIENTE_EXT,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS TEL_2_CLIENTE_EXT 
--,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(B.TEL_CEL_PAIS,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS TEL_CEL_PAIS
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(B.TEL_CEL_NUM,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS TEL_CEL_NUM
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(B.EMAIL_CLIENTE,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS EMAIL_CLIENTE
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(B.SITIO_WEB_CLIENTE,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS SITIO_WEB_CLIENTE
--,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(B.FAX_PAIS,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS FAX_PAIS
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(B.FAX_AREA,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS FAX_AREA
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(B.FAX_NUM,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS FAX_NUM
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(B.FAX_EXT,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS FAX_EXT
--,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(B.CLAVE_MUNICIPIO,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS CLAVE_MUNICIPIO
--,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(B.CLAVE_ESTADO,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS CLAVE_ESTADO
--,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(B.NOMBRE_COLONIA,'|','|'),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS NOMBRE_COLONIA
--,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(B.USUARIO,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS USUARIO
--,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(B.OPERACION,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS OPERACION
--,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(F.CLIENTE_ID,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS CLIENTE_ID
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(F.CENTRO_TRABAJO_ID,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS CENTRO_TRABAJO_ID
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(F.FC_INGRESO_CT,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS FC_INGRESO_CT
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(F.FC_EGRESO_CT,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS FC_EGRESO_CT
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(F.PUESTO,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS PUESTO
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(F.IMPORTE_SALARIO,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS IMPORTE_SALARIO
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(F.COMISIONISTA,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS COMISIONISTA
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(F.ESTATUS,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS ESTATUS_CON_CT
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(F.CENTRO_TRABAJO,'',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS CENTRO_TRABAJO
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(F.IMPORTE_DESCUENTO,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS IMPORTE_DESC
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(F.NUMERO_FONACOT_CT,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS NUMERO_FONACOT_CT
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(F.SALARIO_BASE,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS SALARIO_BASE
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(F.TIPO_SEGURIDAD_SOCIAL,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS TIPO_SEG_SOCIAL
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(F.NUM_SEG_SOCIAL,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS NUM_SEG_SOCIAL
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(F.FECHA_INGRESO_BASE,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS FECHA_INGRESO_BASE
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(F.FECHA_PROCESO_BAJA,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS FECHA_PROCESO_BAJA
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(F.FECHA_CAL_PROCESAR,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS FECHA_CAL_PROCESAR
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(G.CLIENTE_ID,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS CLIENTE_ID_PM
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(G.NOMBRE_REPRESENTANTE,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS NOMBRE_REPRESENTANTE
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(G.PUESTO_REPRESENTANTE,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS PUESTO_REPRESENTANTE
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(G.RFC_REPRESENTANTE,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS RFC_REPRESENTANTE
--,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(G.TIPO_DOCUMENTO,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS TIPO_DOCUMENTO
,case
       WHEN A.TIPO_SEGURIDAD_SOCIAL = 1 THEN '1 CRED.ELECT'
       WHEN A.TIPO_SEGURIDAD_SOCIAL = 2 THEN '2 PASAPORTE'
       WHEN A.TIPO_SEGURIDAD_SOCIAL = 3 THEN '3 CART.MILIT'
       WHEN A.TIPO_SEGURIDAD_SOCIAL = 4 THEN '4 CRED.EMPRES'
       WHEN A.TIPO_SEGURIDAD_SOCIAL = 5 THEN '5 CED.PROFESI'
       ELSE 'X NO CLASIF'
 end as TIPO_DOCUMENTO
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(G.NUMERO_DOCUMENTO,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS NUMERO_DOCUMENTO
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(G.APELLIDO_PATERNO,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS APELLIDO_PATERNO
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(G.APELLIDO_MATERNO,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS APELLIDO_MATERNO
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(G.PRIMER_NOMBRE,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS PRIMER_NOMBRE
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(G.SEGUNDO_NOMBRE,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS SEGUNDO_NOMBRE
--,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(G.TIPO_IMSS,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS TIPO_IMSS
,case
       WHEN G.TIPO_IMSS = 1 THEN '1 IMSS'
       WHEN G.TIPO_IMSS = 2 THEN '2 ISSSTE FEDER'
       WHEN G.TIPO_IMSS = 3 THEN '3 ISSSTE LOCAL'
       WHEN G.TIPO_IMSS = 4 THEN '4 OTRO'
       ELSE 'X NO CLASIF'
 end as TIPO_IMSS
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(G.NO_IMSS_REPRESENTANTE,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS NO_IMSS_REPRESENTANTE
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(TO_CHAR(G.FC_NACIMIENTO,'DD/MM/YYYY'),'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS FC_NACIMIENTO
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(G.PERSONA_REALIZA_TRAM,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS PERSONA_REALIZA_TRAM
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(G.CURP,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS CURP_REP
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(H.CLIENTE_ID,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS CLIENTE_ID_H
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(H.TIPO_CLIENTE,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS TIPO_CLIENTE_H
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(H.TIPO_DOCUMENTO,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS TIPO_DOC_H
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(H.NO_DOCUMENTO,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS NO_DOC_H
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(H.NOMBRE_COMPLETO,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS NOMBRE_COMPLT_H
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(H.TIPO_PERSONA_MORAL,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS TIPO_PERSONA_MORAL_H
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(H.NOMBRE_COMERCIAL,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS NOMBRE_COMERCIAL_H
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(H.GIRO_ID,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS GIRO_ID_H
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(I.NOMBRE_GIRO,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS NOMBRE_GIRO_H
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(H.NO_TRABAJADORES,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS NO_TRABAJADORES_H
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(H.SUCURSAL_PAGO_ID,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS SUCURSAL_PAGO_ID_H
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(H.CERTIFICA_S_N,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS CERTIFICA_S_N_H
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(H.TOT_EMP_SIND,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS TOT_EMP_SIND_H
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(H.TOT_EMP_CONF,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS TOT_EMP_CONF_H
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(H.TOT_EMP_EVEN,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS TOT_EMP_EVEN_H
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(TO_CHAR(H.FECHA_CONSTITUCION,'DD/MM/YYYY'),'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS FECHA_CONSTITUCION_H
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(C.NOMBRE_COLONIA,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS NOMBRE_COLONIA_C
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(D.NOMBRE_MUNICIPIO,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS NOMBRE_MUNICIPIO
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(E.NOMBRE_ESTADO,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS NOMBRE_ESTADO
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
FROM TOPAZ.CL_CLIENTES A
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.CL_CLIENTES_DIR B ON A.CLIENTE_ID=B.CLIENTE_ID
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.TC_COLONIAS C ON B.CLAVE_COLONIA=C.CLAVE_COLONIA
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.TC_MUNICIPIOS D ON B.CLAVE_MUNICIPIO=D.CLAVE_MUNICIPIO
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.TC_ESTADOS E ON B.CLAVE_ESTADO=E.CLAVE_ESTADO 
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.CL_REL_CLIENTE_CT F ON A.CLIENTE_ID=F.CLIENTE_ID
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.CL_REP_PERSONAS_MORALES G ON A.CLIENTE_ID=G.CLIENTE_ID
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.CL_PERSONAS_MORALES H ON A.CLIENTE_ID=H.CLIENTE_ID
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.TC_GIROS I ON H.GIRO_ID=I.GIRO_ID
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.TC_SUCURSALES J ON A.SUCURSAL_ID=J.SUCURSAL_ID
--LEFT JOIN DWH.CAT_TIPOIDENTI G ON A.TIPO_DOCUMENTO=G.DESCRIPCION
WHERE A.TZ_LOCK=0
AND B.TZ_LOCK=0
AND C.TZ_LOCK=0
AND D.TZ_LOCK=0
AND E.TZ_LOCK=0
AND F.TZ_LOCK=0
--AND A.CLIENTE_ID='2837469'--Moral
AND A.CLIENTE_ID='1214991'--Fisica
--AND A.CLIENTE_ID IN ('500005377','1214991','423941','3127933','3127958','3127961','201020544','3194962')--Moral   --'1214991'=Fisica
AND A.TIPO_CLIENTE = 1 --IN ('01','02','03','04')
AND B.TIPO <> '8'
AND B.TIPO='1'
--AND B.EMAIL_CLIENTE IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY A.TIPO_CLIENTE,A.CLIENTE_ID;

------------------------------------------------------------------
29/03/2016 01:41:02 p.m.
------------
|Auditoria |
------------
Esta consulta se está utilizando para la auditoria institucional y
sus observaciones.

------------------------------------------------------------------
Para consultar a los clientes que se están afiliando al Micrositio:

La tabla es = PORTALCT.CL_PRE_AFILIACION_CT

Consulta del Portal (2a version mejorada 29Sep16)

Consulta: correccion fecha a formato dd/mm/yyyy (06Jun18)
SELECT 
 RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.REG_PATRONAL,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS REG_PATRONAL 
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.RFC_CT,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS RFC_CT 
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.RAZON_SOCIAL,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS RAZON_SOCIAL 
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.NO_TRABAJADORES,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS NO_TRABAJADORES 
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.DOMICILIO_FISCAL,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS DOMICILIO_FISCAL 
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.LOCALIDAD_FISCAL,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS LOCALIDAD_FISCAL 
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.CALLE_DOM_FISCAL,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS CALLE_DOM_FISCAL
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.NO_EXTERIOR_FISCAL,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS NO_EXTERIOR_FISCAL
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.NO_INTERIOR_FISCAL,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS NO_INTERIOR_FISCAL
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.COD_COLONIA_FISCAL,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS COD_COLONIA_FISCAL
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.COLONIA_FISCAL,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS COLONIA_FISCAL
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.DELEG_MUNICIPIO_FISCAL,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS DELEG_MUNICIPIO_FISCAL
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.ESTADO_FISCAL,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS ESTADO_FISCAL
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.COD_POSTAL_FISCAL,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS COD_POSTAL_FISCAL
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.UBICACION_FISCAL,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS UBICACION_FISCAL
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.PERSONA_REALIZA_TRAM,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS PERSONA_REALIZA_TRAM
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.APELLIDO_PATERNO,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS APELLIDO_PATERNO
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.APELLIDO_MATERNO,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS APELLIDO_MATERNO
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.NOMBRE,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS NOMBRE
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.SEGUNDO_NOMBRE,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS SEGUNDO_NOMBRE
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.RFC_HOMOCLAVE_PER,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS RFC_HOMOCLAVE_PER
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(TO_CHAR(A.FECHA_NACIMIENTO_PER,'DD/MM/YYYY'),'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS FECHA_NACIMIENTO_PER
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.ENTIDAD_NACIMIENTO_PER,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS ENTIDAD_NACIMIENTO_PER
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.CARGO,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS CARGO
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.CORREO_ELECTRONICO,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS CORREO_ELECTRONICO
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.FOLIO_AFILIACION,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS FOLIO_AFILIACION
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.CADENA_ORIGINAL_CT,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS CADENA_ORIGINAL_CT
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.FORMA_AUTENTICACION,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS FORMA_AUTENTICACION
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.ESTATUS_AFILIACION,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS ESTATUS_AFILIACION
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(TO_CHAR(A.FECHA_PRECARGA,'DD/MM/YYYY'),'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS FECHA_PRECARGA
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(TO_CHAR(A.FECHA_CONFIRMACION,'DD/MM/YYYY'),'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS FECHA_CONFIRMACION
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(TO_CHAR(A.FECHA_INI_AFIL,'DD/MM/YYYY'),'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS FECHA_INI_AFIL
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(TO_CHAR(A.FECHA_ULT_MODIFICACION,'DD/MM/YYYY'),'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS FECHA_ULT_MODIFICACION
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.PERSONA_JURIDICA_CT,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS PERSONA_JURIDICA_CT
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.GIRO,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS GIRO
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.ID_MUNICIPIO,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS ID_MUNICIPIO
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.ID_ESTADO,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS ID_ESTADO
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.TELEFONO1,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS TELEFONO1
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.TELEFONO2,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS TELEFONO2
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.ID_SECTOR,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS ID_SECTOR
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.GIRO_IMSS,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS GIRO_IMSS
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.ESTADO_PRECARGA,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS ESTADO_PRECARGA
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.ID_AUT_TRANSAC,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS ID_AUT_TRANSAC
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.TOTAL_TRABAJADORES_INF,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS TOTAL_TRABAJADORES_INF
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.LOCALIDAD,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS LOCALIDAD     
FROM PORTALCT.CL_PRE_AFILIACION_CT A
ORDER BY ESTADO_FISCAL,DELEG_MUNICIPIO_FISCAL,COLONIA_FISCAL,RFC_CT;

------------------------------------------------------------------
Para consultar el estatus por año de la afiliación al Micrositio

SELECT to_char(FECHA_CONFIRMACION, 'YYYY'),ESTATUS_AFILIACION,COUNT(*) AS TOTAL
FROM PORTALCT.CL_PRE_AFILIACION_CT
WHERE ESTATUS_AFILIACION>0
GROUP BY to_char(FECHA_CONFIRMACION, 'YYYY'),ESTATUS_AFILIACION
ORDER BY to_char(FECHA_CONFIRMACION, 'YYYY'),ESTATUS_AFILIACION;

Para conocer los estatus de la afiliacion
SELECT *
FROM PORTALCT.TC_ESTADOS_AFIL;
------------------------------------------------------------------

--Seleccionar aquellos Centros de Trabajo dados de alta con fecha anterior 1974
SELECT 
  to_char(FECHA_ALTA, 'YYYY') as AÑO
  ,count(*) as TOTAL
FROM 
  TOPAZ.CL_CLIENTES
WHERE 
  TZ_LOCK=0
  AND to_char(FECHA_ALTA, 'YYYY') < 1974
  AND TIPO_PERSONA='M'
GROUP BY to_char(FECHA_ALTA, 'YYYY')
ORDER BY to_char(FECHA_ALTA, 'YYYY') ASC;

--Seleccionar los estatus 2 y fecha mayor igual a 2013
SELECT to_char(A.FECHA_ULT_MODIFICACION, 'YYYY') AS AÑO_FECHA_CONF,A.ESTATUS_AFILIACION AS ESTATUS_AFIL,COUNT(*) AS TOTAL,UPPER(B.DESCRIPCION) AS DESCRIP
FROM PORTALCT.CL_PRE_AFILIACION_CT A
LEFT JOIN PORTALCT.TC_ESTADOS_AFIL B ON A.ESTATUS_AFILIACION=B.ID_ESTADO_AFIL
WHERE A.ESTATUS_AFILIACION > 0
AND to_char(A.FECHA_ULT_MODIFICACION, 'YYYY') >= (2013)
AND A.ESTATUS_AFILIACION IN (2)
GROUP BY to_char(A.FECHA_ULT_MODIFICACION, 'YYYY'),A.ESTATUS_AFILIACION,B.DESCRIPCION
ORDER BY to_char(A.FECHA_ULT_MODIFICACION, 'YYYY'),A.ESTATUS_AFILIACION,B.DESCRIPCION;
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Select para Registro en el Portal

SELECT
   replace(TRIM(replace(A.REG_PATRONAL,'*','')),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS REG_PATRONAL  
  ,replace(TRIM(replace(A.RFC_CT,'*','')),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS RFC_CT  
  ,replace(TRIM(replace(UPPER(A.RAZON_SOCIAL),'*','')),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS RAZON_SOCIAL    
  ,replace(TRIM(replace(A.NO_TRABAJADORES,'*','')),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NO_TRABAJADORES  
  ,replace(TRIM(replace(A.DOMICILIO_FISCAL,'*','')),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS DOMICILIO_FISCAL
  ,replace(TRIM(replace(A.LOCALIDAD_FISCAL,'*','')),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS LOCALIDAD_FISCAL
  ,replace(TRIM(replace(A.CALLE_DOM_FISCAL,'*','')),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS CALLE_DOM_FISCAL  
  ,replace(TRIM(replace(A.NO_EXTERIOR_FISCAL,'*','')),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NO_EXTERIOR_FISCAL
  ,replace(TRIM(replace(A.NO_INTERIOR_FISCAL,'*','')),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NO_INTERIOR_FISCAL  
  ,replace(TRIM(replace(A.COD_COLONIA_FISCAL,'*','')),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS COD_COLONIA_FISCAL  
  ,replace(TRIM(replace(A.DELEG_MUNICIPIO_FISCAL,'*','')),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS DELEG_MUNICIPIO_FISCAL
  ,replace(TRIM(replace(A.ESTADO_FISCAL,'*','')),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS ESTADO_FISCAL
  ,replace(TRIM(replace(A.COD_POSTAL_FISCAL,'*','')),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS COD_POSTAL_FISCAL
  ,replace(TRIM(replace(A.UBICACION_FISCAL,'*','')),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS UBICACION_FISCAL  
  ,replace(TRIM(replace(A.PERSONA_REALIZA_TRAM,'*','')),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS PERSONA_REALIZA_TRAM
  ,replace(TRIM(replace(A.APELLIDO_PATERNO,'*','')),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS APELLIDO_PATERNO
  ,replace(TRIM(replace(A.APELLIDO_MATERNO,'*','')),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS APELLIDO_MATERNO
  ,replace(TRIM(replace(A.NOMBRE,'*','')),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NOMBRE
  ,replace(TRIM(replace(A.SEGUNDO_NOMBRE,'*','')),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS SEGUNDO_NOMBRE  
  ,replace(TRIM(replace(A.RFC_HOMOCLAVE_PER,'*','')),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS RFC_HOMOCLAVE_PER  
  ,replace(TRIM(replace(A.FECHA_NACIMIENTO_PER,'*','')),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS FECHA_NACIMIENTO_PER
  ,replace(TRIM(replace(A.ENTIDAD_NACIMIENTO_PER,'*','')),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS ENTIDAD_NACIMIENTO_PER
  ,replace(TRIM(replace(A.CURP,'*','')),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS CURP  
  ,replace(TRIM(replace(A.CARGO,'*','')),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS CARGO
  ,replace(TRIM(replace(A.CORREO_ELECTRONICO,'*','')),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS CORREO_ELECTRONICO  
  ,replace(TRIM(replace(A.FOLIO_AFILIACION,'*','')),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS FOLIO_AFILIACION
  ,replace(TRIM(replace(A.FORMA_AUTENTICACION,'*','')),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS FORMA_AUTENTICACION
  ,replace(TRIM(replace(A.ESTATUS_AFILIACION,'*','')),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS ESTATUS_AFILIACION
  --,replace(TRIM(replace(A.FECHA_PRECARGA,'*','')),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS FECHA_PRECARGA
  ,replace(TRIM(replace(A.FECHA_CONFIRMACION,'*','')),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS FECHA_CONFIRMACION
  ,replace(TRIM(replace(A.FECHA_INI_AFIL,'*','')),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS FECHA_INI_AFIL
  ,replace(TRIM(replace(A.FECHA_ULT_MODIFICACION,'*','')),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS FECHA_ULT_MODIFICACION
  ,replace(TRIM(replace(A.PERSONA_JURIDICA_CT,'*','')),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS PERSONA_JURIDICA_CT
  ,replace(TRIM(replace(A.GIRO,'*','')),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS GIRO
  ,replace(TRIM(replace(A.ID_MUNICIPIO,'*','')),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS ID_MUNICIPIO
  ,replace(TRIM(replace(A.ID_ESTADO,'*','')),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS ID_ESTADO
  ,replace(TRIM(replace(A.TELEFONO1,'*','')),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TELEFONO1
  ,replace(TRIM(replace(A.TELEFONO2,'*','')),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TELEFONO2
  ,replace(TRIM(replace(A.ID_SECTOR,'*','')),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS ID_SECTOR
  ,replace(TRIM(replace(A.GIRO_IMSS,'*','')),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS GIRO_IMSS
  ,replace(TRIM(replace(A.TOTAL_TRABAJADORES_INF,'*','')),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TOTAL_TRABAJADORES_INF
  ,replace(TRIM(replace(A.LOCALIDAD,'*','')),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS LOCALIDAD
  ,B.NOMBRE_MUNICIPIO AS MUNICIPIO
  ,C.NOMBRE_ESTADO AS ESTADO
FROM PORTALCT.CL_PRE_AFILIACION_CT A
    LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.TC_MUNICIPIOS B ON A.ID_MUNICIPIO=B.CLAVE_MUNICIPIO  
    LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.TC_ESTADOS C ON A.ID_ESTADO=C.CLAVE_ESTADO
    ORDER BY ESTADO,MUNICIPIO,LOCALIDAD,RFC_CT;

--WHERE A.RAZON_SOCIAL LIKE 'NUMERO UNO COM%';
--WHERE RFC_CT IN ('NUC0005044A2','SALA610802AX1');

Ejercicios realizados para Credito Seguro con Viridiana

/*
NO CREDITO=29959
NO FONACOT CLIENTE=3237117
FOLIO=23798511
NRO CONTRATO=10691921
TRABAJADOR=REBECA YADIRA JUAREZ FLORES
*/

SELECT *
FROM TOPAZ.CL_CLIENTES
WHERE CLIENTE_ID = 3237117;

SELECT * FROM TOPAZ.CR_DISPOSICIONES A WHERE A.IDTRABAJADOR = '3237117';

SELECT DISTINCT BANCO_ID 
FROM TOPAZ.CL_CUENTAS_PAGO WHERE FECHA_PAGO = '07/04/16'
ORDER BY BANCO_ID ASC;

SELECT * FROM TOPAZ.CL_CUENTAS_PAGO WHERE CLIENTE_ID = '3237117';

SELECT * FROM TOPAZ.CL_CUENTAS_PAGO WHERE CLIENTE_ID = '3011176';

REPORTE 1
SELECT FECHA_PAGO,BANCO_ID,COUNT(*) AS TOTAL
FROM TOPAZ.CL_CUENTAS_PAGO 
WHERE TZ_LOCK=0
AND FECHA_PAGO = '07/04/16'
GROUP BY BANCO_ID,FECHA_PAGO
ORDER BY BANCO_ID ASC;

REPORTE 2
SELECT *
FROM TOPAZ.CL_CUENTAS_PAGO
WHERE TZ_LOCK=0
AND FECHA_PAGO = '07/04/16'
AND BANCO_ID=17;

REPORTE 3
--CLABE VENGA EN CERO
--3011176

SELECT *
FROM TOPAZ.TC_CATEGORIAS_PAGO;

SELECT * 
FROM TOPAZ.TC_BANCOS
WHERE TZ_LOCK=0;

Para Instalar CREDERE
1. http://128.100.200.162:8081/topaz/app/
2. Bajar Instalar-CREDERE-PRE.exe
3. Genera el icono: CREDERE_JDK16 Pre-produccion
4. Mi usuario: PRE5971 pwd: qwer....90
(07May18) Mi usuario es:PRE5971 pwd: qwerxx1234

Para agregar ceros a una cadena

SELECT to_char( 12345, '00000000' ) FROM dual;
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Consultar el estatus de un cliente con Desc de su estatus en DWH.CAT_CLESTATUS

SELECT 
   A.CLIENTE_ID
  ,A.STATUS
  ,B.TIPO
  ,C.TIPO_CTE
  ,C.CODIGO
  ,C.DESCRIPCION
FROM TOPAZ.CL_CLIENTES A
INNER JOIN TOPAZ.CL_CLIENTES_DIR B ON A.CLIENTE_ID=B.CLIENTE_ID
INNER JOIN DWH.CAT_CLESTATUS C ON CONCAT(to_char(B.TIPO,'00'),A.STATUS)=CONCAT(to_char(C.TIPO_CTE,'00'),C.CODIGO)
WHERE A.CLIENTE_ID='118685862';

--Nombre base datos actual
select ora_database_name from dual;
FONATOPD

--Version de Oracle
select * from v$version;

Consulta Clientes version OK5.
Esta version remueve los *,",CR,LF de la linea

SELECT 
 RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.TIPO_CLIENTE,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS TIPO_CLIENTE
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.CLIENTE_ID,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS CLIENTE_ID
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.TIPO_PERSONA,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS TIPO_PERSONA
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.NOMBRE_COMPLETO,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS NOMBRE_COMPLETO
--,replace(RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(A.NOMBRE_CORTO,'*',''))),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NOMBRE_CORTO
--,replace(RTRIM(LTRIM(A.PRIMER_NOMBRE)),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS PRIMER_NOMBRE
--,replace(RTRIM(LTRIM(A.SEGUNDO_NOMBRE)),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS SEGUNDO_NOMBRE
--,replace(RTRIM(LTRIM(A.APELLIDO_PATERNO)),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS APELLIDO_PATERNO
--,replace(RTRIM(LTRIM(A.APELLIDO_MATERNO)),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS APELLIDO_MATERNO
--,replace(RTRIM(A.FECHA_NACIMIENTO),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS FECHA_NACIMIENTO
--,replace(RTRIM(A.SEXO),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS SEXO
--,replace(RTRIM(A.ESTADO_CIVIL),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS ESTADO_CIVIL
--,replace(RTRIM(A.TIPO_VIVIENDA),chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TIPO_VIVIENDA
--,replace(A.NUM_ANIOS_HABITADA,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS ANIOS_HABITADA
--,replace(A.NUM_PERSONAS_DEPEND,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NUM_PERS_DEPEND
--,replace(A.IMPORTE_OTROS_INGRESOS,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS IMPORTE_OTROS_ING

,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.CREDITOS_CON,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS CREDITOS_CON
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.SUCURSAL_ID,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS SUCURSAL_ID
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.TRAMITA,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS TRAMITA
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.STATUS,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS STATUS
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.ZONA_FRONTERIZA,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS ZONA_FRONTERIZA
--,replace(A.COMO_SE_ENTERO,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS COMO_SE_ENTERO
--,replace(A.COD_INTER_FINAN,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS COD_INTER_FINAN
--,replace(A.COD_RESIDENCIA,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS COD_RESIDENCIA
--,replace(A.SUB_DIV_INT_1,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS SUB_DIV_INT_1
--,replace(A.SUB_DIV_INT_2,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS SUB_DIV_INT_2
--,replace(A.SUB_DIV_INT_3,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS SUB_DIV_INT_3
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.ZONA_ECONOMICA,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS ZONA_ECONOMICA
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.FECHA_ALTA,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS FECHA_ALTA
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.FECHA_REACTIVACION,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS FECHA_REACTIVACION
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.FECHA_BAJA,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS FECHA_BAJA
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.TIPO_DOCUMENTO,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS TIPO_DOCUMENTO
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.NUMERO_DOCUMENTO,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS NUMERO_DOCUMENTO

,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.RFC,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS RFC
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.NUM_SEG_SOCIAL,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS NUM_SEG_SOCIAL
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.CURP,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS CURP
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.TIPO_AFILIACION,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS TIPO_AFILIACION
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.TIPO_SEGURIDAD_SOCIAL,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS TIPO_SEGURIDAD_SOCIAL
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.MESES_HABITADA,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS MESES_HABITADA
--,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.ID_CT_CONYUGE,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS ID_CT_CONYUGE
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.PLAZOS_DEFECTO,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS PLAZOS_DEFECTO
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.NOM_CT_REF_1,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS NOM_CT_REF_1
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.ID_CT_REF_2,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS ID_CT_REF_2
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.NOM_CT_REF_2,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS NOM_CT_REF_2

,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.TRAMITA_ID,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS TRAMITA_ID
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.NUM_FOLIO,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS NUM_FOLIO
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.REF1_CONFIRMADA_S_N,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS REF1_CONFIRMADA_S_N
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.REF2_CONFIRMADA_S_N,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS REF2_CONFIRMADA_S_N
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.FECHA_APORTACION,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS FECHA_APORTACION
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.IMPORTE_APORTACION,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS IMPORTE_APORTACION
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.CONTRATO,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS CONTRATO
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.USUARIO_ALTA,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS USUARIO_ALTA
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.PERIODO_NOMINAL,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS PERIODO_NOMINAL
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.CALIFICACION,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS CALIFICACION
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.SUCURSAL_CONFIRM,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS SUCURSAL_CONFIRM
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.FECHA_CONFIRM,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS FECHA_CONFIRM
--,replace(A.NOMBRE_CONYUGE,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NOMBRE_CONYUGE
--,replace(A.TRABAJA_CONYUGE,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS TRABAJA_CONYUGE
--,replace(A.CT_CONYUGE,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS CT_CONYUGE
--,replace(A.NOMBRE_REF1,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NOMBRE_REF1

--,replace(A.LUGAR_NACIMIENTO,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS LUGAR_NACIMIENTO
--,replace(A.NACIONALIDAD,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NACIONALIDAD
--,replace(A.NIVEL_ESTUDIOS,chr(13) || chr(10), '') AS NIVEL_ESTUDIOS
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.PERIODO_NOMINAL,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS PERIODO_NOMINAL
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.CALIFICACION,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS CALIFICACION
--,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.SUCURSAL_CONFIRM,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS SUCURSAL_CONFIRM
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.FECHA_CONFIRM,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS FECHA_CONFIRM
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.USUARIO,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS USUARIO
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.OPERACION,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS OPERACION
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.USUARIO,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS USUARIO
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.OPERACION,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS OPERACION 
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.TIMESTAMP,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS TIMESTAMP_FILE
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.HORA,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS HORA
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.CTA_CLABE,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS CTA_CLABE
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(A.CLIENTE_ID,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS CLIENTE_ID
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(B.TIPO,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS TIPO
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(B.NOM_CALLE,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS NOM_CALLE
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(B.ORDINAL,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS ORDINAL
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(B.NUM_EXT,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS NUM_EXT
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(B.NUM_INT,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS NUM_INT
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(B.REF_UBICA,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS REF_UBICA
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(B.COD_POSTAL,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS COD_POSTAL
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(B.CLAVE_COLONIA,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS CLAVE_COLONIA
--,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(B.TEL_FIJO_PAIS,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS TEL_FIJO_PAIS
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(B.TEL_FIJO_AREA,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS TEL_FIJO_AREA
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(B.TEL_FIJO_NUM,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS TEL_FIJO_NUM
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(B.TEL_FIJO_EXT,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS TEL_FIJO_EXT
--,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(B.TEL_2_CLIENTE_PAIS,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS TEL2_CLIENTE_PAIS
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(B.TEL_2_CLIENTE_AREA,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS TEL2_CLIENTE_AREA
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(B.TEL_2_CLIENTE,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS TEL_2_CLIENTE
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(B.TEL_2_CLIENTE_EXT,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS TEL_2_CLIENTE_EXT 
--,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(B.TEL_CEL_PAIS,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS TEL_CEL_PAIS
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(B.TEL_CEL_NUM,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS TEL_CEL_NUM
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(B.EMAIL_CLIENTE,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS EMAIL_CLIENTE
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(B.SITIO_WEB_CLIENTE,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS SITIO_WEB_CLIENTE
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(B.FAX_PAIS,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS FAX_PAIS
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(B.FAX_AREA,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS FAX_AREA
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(B.FAX_NUM,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS FAX_NUM
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(B.FAX_EXT,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS FAX_EXT
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(B.CLAVE_MUNICIPIO,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS CLAVE_MUNICIPIO
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(B.CLAVE_ESTADO,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS CLAVE_ESTADO
--,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(B.NOMBRE_COLONIA,'|','|'),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS NOMBRE_COLONIA
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(B.USUARIO,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS USUARIO
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(B.OPERACION,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS OPERACION
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(F.CLIENTE_ID,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS CLIENTE_ID
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(F.CENTRO_TRABAJO_ID,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS CENTRO_TRABAJO_ID
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(F.FC_INGRESO_CT,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS FC_INGRESO_CT
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(F.FC_EGRESO_CT,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS FC_EGRESO_CT
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(F.PUESTO,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS PUESTO
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(F.IMPORTE_SALARIO,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS IMPORTE_SALARIO
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(F.COMISIONISTA,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS COMISIONISTA
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(F.ESTATUS,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS ESTATUS_CON_CT
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(F.CENTRO_TRABAJO,'',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS CENTRO_TRABAJO
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(F.IMPORTE_DESCUENTO,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS IMPORTE_DESC
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(F.NUMERO_FONACOT_CT,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS NUMERO_FONACOT_CT
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(F.SALARIO_BASE,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS SALARIO_BASE
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(F.TIPO_SEGURIDAD_SOCIAL,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS TIPO_SEG_SOCIAL
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(F.NUM_SEG_SOCIAL,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS NUM_SEG_SOCIAL
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(F.FECHA_INGRESO_BASE,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS FECHA_INGRESO_BASE
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(F.FECHA_PROCESO_BAJA,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS FECHA_PROCESO_BAJA
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(F.FECHA_CAL_PROCESAR,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS FECHA_CAL_PROCESAR
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(G.CLIENTE_ID,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS CLIENTE_ID_PM
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(G.NOMBRE_REPRESENTANTE,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS NOMBRE_REPRESENTANTE
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(G.PUESTO_REPRESENTANTE,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS PUESTO_REPRESENTANTE
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(G.RFC_REPRESENTANTE,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS RFC_REPRESENTANTE
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(G.TIPO_DOCUMENTO,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS TIPO_DOCUMENTO
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(G.NUMERO_DOCUMENTO,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS NUMERO_DOCUMENTO
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(G.APELLIDO_PATERNO,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS APELLIDO_PATERNO
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(G.APELLIDO_MATERNO,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS APELLIDO_MATERNO
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(G.PRIMER_NOMBRE,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS PRIMER_NOMBRE
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(G.SEGUNDO_NOMBRE,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS SEGUNDO_NOMBRE
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(G.TIPO_IMSS,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS TIPO_IMSS
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(G.NO_IMSS_REPRESENTANTE,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS NO_IMSS_REPRESENTANTE
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(G.FC_NACIMIENTO,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS FC_NACIMIENTO
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(G.PERSONA_REALIZA_TRAM,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS PERSONA_REALIZA_TRAM
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(G.CURP,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS CURP_REP
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(H.CLIENTE_ID,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS CLIENTE_ID_H
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(H.TIPO_CLIENTE,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS TIPO_CLIENTE_H
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(H.TIPO_DOCUMENTO,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS TIPO_DOC_H
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(H.NO_DOCUMENTO,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS NO_DOC_H
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(H.NOMBRE_COMPLETO,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS NOMBRE_COMPLT_H
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(H.TIPO_PERSONA_MORAL,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS TIPO_PERSONA_MORAL_H
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(H.NOMBRE_COMERCIAL,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS NOMBRE_COMERCIAL_H
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(H.GIRO_ID,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS GIRO_ID_H
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(I.NOMBRE_GIRO,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS NOMBRE_GIRO_H
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(H.NO_TRABAJADORES,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS NO_TRABAJADORES_H
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(H.SUCURSAL_PAGO_ID,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS SUCURSAL_PAGO_ID_H
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(H.CERTIFICA_S_N,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS CERTIFICA_S_N_H
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(H.TOT_EMP_SIND,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS TOT_EMP_SIND_H
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(H.TOT_EMP_CONF,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS TOT_EMP_CONF_H
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(H.TOT_EMP_EVEN,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS TOT_EMP_EVEN_H
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(H.FECHA_CONSTITUCION,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS FECHA_CONSTITUCION_H
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(C.NOMBRE_COLONIA,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS NOMBRE_COLONIA_C
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(D.NOMBRE_MUNICIPIO,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS NOMBRE_MUNICIPIO
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(E.NOMBRE_ESTADO,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS NOMBRE_ESTADO
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
FROM TOPAZ.CL_CLIENTES A
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.CL_CLIENTES_DIR B ON A.CLIENTE_ID=B.CLIENTE_ID
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.TC_COLONIAS C ON B.CLAVE_COLONIA=C.CLAVE_COLONIA
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.TC_MUNICIPIOS D ON B.CLAVE_MUNICIPIO=D.CLAVE_MUNICIPIO
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.TC_ESTADOS E ON B.CLAVE_ESTADO=E.CLAVE_ESTADO 
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.CL_REL_CLIENTE_CT F ON A.CLIENTE_ID=F.CLIENTE_ID
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.CL_REP_PERSONAS_MORALES G ON A.CLIENTE_ID=G.CLIENTE_ID
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.CL_PERSONAS_MORALES H ON A.CLIENTE_ID=H.CLIENTE_ID
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.TC_GIROS I ON H.GIRO_ID=I.GIRO_ID
--LEFT JOIN DWH.CAT_TIPOIDENTI G ON A.TIPO_DOCUMENTO=G.DESCRIPCION
WHERE A.TZ_LOCK=0
--AND B.TZ_LOCK=0
--AND C.TZ_LOCK=0
--AND D.TZ_LOCK=0
--AND E.TZ_LOCK=0
--AND F.TZ_LOCK=0
--AND A.CLIENTE_ID='2837469'--Moral   --'1214991'=Fisica
--AND A.CLIENTE_ID IN ('500005377','1214991','423941','3127933','3127958','3127961','201020544','3194962')--Moral   --'1214991'=Fisica
AND A.TIPO_CLIENTE = '02'
AND B.TIPO <> '8'
AND B.TIPO='1'
AND B.EMAIL_CLIENTE IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY A.TIPO_CLIENTE,A.CLIENTE_ID;
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Representantes Medicos

SELECT A.TIPO,B.PUESTO,A.EMAIL_CLIENTE
FROM TOPAZ.CL_CLIENTES_DIR A
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.CL_REL_CLIENTE_CT B ON A.CLIENTE_ID=B.CLIENTE_ID 
WHERE A.TZ_LOCK=0
AND B.PUESTO LIKE '%MEDIC%'
AND A.EMAIL_CLIENTE NOT LIKE '%fonacot%'
AND A.EMAIL_CLIENTE is not null;
------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Corrección a los Emails para evitar vacios y fonacot.gob.mx

SELECT TRIM(EMAIL_CLIENTE)
FROM TOPAZ.CL_CLIENTES_DIR
WHERE TZ_LOCK=0
AND TRIM(EMAIL_CLIENTE) <> ' '
AND TRIM(EMAIL_CLIENTE) NOT LIKE '%fonacot.gob.mx'
AND TRIM(EMAIL_CLIENTE) NOT LIKE '%.@%'
AND TRIM(EMAIL_CLIENTE) NOT LIKE '%@.%'
AND TRIM(EMAIL_CLIENTE) <> '@'
AND TRIM(EMAIL_CLIENTE) <> ',@,.'
AND TRIM(EMAIL_CLIENTE) <> '.'
AND EMAIL_CLIENTE IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY EMAIL_CLIENTE;
------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Tablas para el acceso al IMSS

SELECT * FROM TOPAZ.AUX_IMSS_CT;
SELECT * FROM TOPAZ.AUX_IMSS_TRAB order by NUMERO_AFILIACION;
SELECT * FROM TOPAZ.TMP_IMSS_TRAB;
SELECT * FROM TOPAZ.TC_IMSS_TRAB where NUMERO_AFILIACION='30038004385'; --Historico Laboral

------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Seleccionar primera columna y resto columnas ,*

SELECT DS.TIPO_DISPOSICION,DS.*
FROM TOPAZ.CR_DISPOSICIONES DS
WHERE DS.TZ_LOCK=0
AND DS.IDTRABAJADOR IN ('3237117','3236760');

------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Para exportar directo a csv en el result /*csv*/

SELECT /*csv*/ * FROM TOPAZ.TC_SUCURSALES WHERE SUCURSAL_ID <= 15;
SELECT /*csv*/ * FROM TOPAZ.TC_SUCURSALES WHERE SUCURSAL_ID BETWEEN 1 AND 100;
------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Para exportar como HTML

SELECT '<A HREF="http://oracle.com/'||NOMBRE_SUCURSAL||'.html">'||TIPO_SUCURSAL||'</A>' DIR_NOM_CALLE, SUCURSAL_ID
FROM TOPAZ.TC_SUCURSALES 
WHERE SUCURSAL_ID>0; 

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Azar random aleatorio

Para seleccionar 20 registros al azar

Select *
  from (select *
          from table
         order by dbms_random.value) -- you can also use DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM
 where rownum < 21;
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Por ejemplo, aquí se obtiene 25% de los registros:

SELECT * FROM emp SAMPLE(25)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Selecciona una muestra 10% al azar (no es que traiga 10 registros cada consulta varia)

SELECT * FROM TOPAZ.TC_SUCURSALES SAMPLE (10);

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Selecciona una muestra 10% al azar (no es que traiga 10 registros,siempre trae igual)

SELECT * FROM TOPAZ.TC_SUCURSALES SAMPLE (10) SEED(1);

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Para mostrar el ranking de Salarios

Select * From Emp;

select * from (
          select empno
                 , sal
                 , dense_rank() over (order by sal desc) as rnk
          from emp)
    where rnk <= 5;
 
Nota: utilizar rank() over ... si se desea contar el duplicado

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Para realizar una suma

SELECT 3+4 FROM DUAL;

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Hacer un Cubo en SQL Oracle

https://docs.oracle.com/cd/B19306_01/server.102/b14200/statements_10002.htm#i2066378

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Para exportar tipo fecha con una x previa

SELECT 'X-' || TO_CHAR(FECHA_CONFIRM,'YYYY-MM') || '-01' AS FECHA_CONF,COUNT(*) AS TOTAL
FROM TOPAZ.CL_CLIENTES
WHERE TZ_LOCK=0
AND TIPO_CLIENTE='01'
GROUP BY 'X-' || TO_CHAR(FECHA_CONFIRM,'YYYY-MM') || '-01'
ORDER BY 'X-' || TO_CHAR(FECHA_CONFIRM,'YYYY-MM') || '-01' DESC;
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Tipo de Sucursal

SELECT *
FROM DWH.CAT_TIPOSUCURSAL;
1	OFICINA CENTRAL
2	DIRECCION REGIONAL
3	DIRECCION ESTATAL
4	DIRECCION PLAZA
5	REPRESENTACION

Catalogos e Historico de Sucursales

SELECT *
FROM DWH.DWH_SUCURSALES;

SELECT *
FROM DWH.DMS_SUCURSALES_HIST;
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Sucursales Activas

SELECT * 
FROM TOPAZ.TC_SUCURSALES
WHERE TZ_LOCK=0
AND STATUS='A';
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Estados de los Creditos en Credito Seguro

1		Autorizado									Crédito Autorizado pero No Depositado y No Ejercido
2 	Ejercido										Deposito Exitoso, ejercido y registro contable
3 	Anulado por Error						Rechazada la solicitud por Mesa de Autorizacion
9  	Autorizar para Disposicion  Listo para Autorizar por Mesa de Autorizacion
10	Cancelado por Rechazo 			Rechazado por el Banco

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Para seleccionar los créditos en Credito Seguro

Para la extracción de información, solo se utilizan 3 filtros
•	FECHAAUTORIZADO: Indicando el periodo de consulta
•	TZ_LOCK=0
•	ORIGEN in ('I','O') : Toma todos los Créditos originados en FRONT. 
Durante los primeros días de Implementación el origen de estos Créditos se consideraban con “I”, posteriormente se definió que el origen seria “O”.

select c.* ,  (select topaz.usuarios.nombre from topaz.usuarios
              where topaz.usuarios.iniciales = c.usuario_autoriza) as nom_autoriza,
              (select topaz.usuarios.grupo from topaz.usuarios
              where topaz.usuarios.iniciales = c.usuario_autoriza) as gpo_aut,
              (select topaz.usuarios.nombre from topaz.usuarios
              where topaz.usuarios.iniciales = c.usuario_autesp) as nom_autesp,
              (select topaz.usuarios.grupo from topaz.usuarios
              where topaz.usuarios.iniciales = c.usuario_autesp) as gpo_autesp
from TOPAZ.CR_DISPOSICIONES c
where FECHAAUTORIZADO between  '30/03/2016' and '25/05/2016'
and   TZ_LOCK=0
and   ORIGEN in ('I','O');

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Seleccionar todos los créditos del día 30-Abr-16 que fueron otorgados por medio de Credito Seguro

SELECT FECHAAUTORIZADO
       ,ESTADO
       ,SUM(CAPITALAUTORIZADO) AS IMP_CAPT_AUT
		   ,COUNT(CAPITALAUTORIZADO) AS TOT_CAPT_AUT
		   ,SUM(PRIMA_AUTORIZADA) AS SUM_PRIMA_AUT
       --,COUNT(PRIMA_AUTORIZADA) AS TOT_PRIMA_AUT
FROM TOPAZ.CR_DISPOSICIONES
WHERE TZ_LOCK=0
--AND SUCURSALAUTORIZA=3
AND FECHAAUTORIZADO between  '01/06/2016' and '17/06/2016'
AND ORIGEN IN ('I','O')
GROUP BY FECHAAUTORIZADO,ESTADO
ORDER BY FECHAAUTORIZADO ASC,ESTADO DESC;

La siguiente tabla coincide CORRECTO con el mail enviado por Bogar:
(por lo cual cuadra la cifra correctamente)

FECHAAUTORIZADO	ESTADO	IMP_CAPT_AUT	TOT_CAPT_AUT	SUM_PRIMA_AUT	
30/04/2016	    1	      422,610 	    25 	          38,857 	
30/04/2016	    3	      48,857 	       6 	           3,461 	
30/04/2016	    9	      13,623 	       2 	           1,209 	
_______________________________________________________________________
 		                    485,089 	    33 	          43,527 	 
 		                    														GRAN TOTAL=528,616 (cuadra con Bogar) 		                    														

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
CRD_REPORTE_MESA
Contiene la información proporcionada por el aplicativo de Crédito Seguro, cuyo detalle permitirá identificar los tiempos utilizados 
por los analistas desde la originación hasta la autorización / cancelación en Mesa de Control. Esta tabla se generará en Credere.

CRD_REPORTE_HISTORIA	
Contiene la información histórica que será removida de la tabla principal de reporte, la estructura será igual a la tabla de CRD_REPORTE_MESA

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Seleccionar un centro de trabajo LIKE (mayúsculas)

select *
from TOPAZ.CL_CLIENTES
where NOMBRE_COMPLETO like 'UHTHOFF%';

200456829	M	UHTHOFF, GOMEZ VEGA & UHTHOFF, S.C.
200456810	M	UHTHOFF GOMEZ VEGA AND UHTHOFF
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Seguro Institucional para Trabajadores Acreditados

select *
from TOPAZ.tc_aseguradoras;
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Seleccionar clientes version corta sin fonacot.gob sin arrobas solo nombre,cel,email y ciudad

SELECT 
 TRIM(B.FECHA_ALTA) as FECHA_ALTA
,TRIM(TIPO_CLIENTE) as TIPO_CLIENTE
,TRIM(B.STATUS) as ESTATUS_CLIENTE
,TRIM(NOMBRE_COMPLETO) as NOMBRE_COMPLETO
,TRIM(TEL_FIJO_AREA) || '+' || TRIM(TEL_FIJO_NUM) as TEL_FIJO
,TRIM(TEL_CEL_NUM) as TEL_CELULAR
,TRIM(EMAIL_CLIENTE) as EMAIL_CLIENTE
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(C.NOMBRE_COLONIA,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS NOMBRE_COLONIA_C
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(D.NOMBRE_MUNICIPIO,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS NOMBRE_MUNICIPIO
,RTRIM(LTRIM(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(E.NOMBRE_ESTADO,'|',''),'"',''),'*',''),chr(13),''),chr(10),''))) AS NOMBRE_ESTADO
FROM TOPAZ.CL_CLIENTES_DIR A
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.CL_CLIENTES B on A.CLIENTE_ID=B.CLIENTE_ID
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.TC_COLONIAS C ON A.CLAVE_COLONIA=C.CLAVE_COLONIA
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.TC_MUNICIPIOS D ON A.CLAVE_MUNICIPIO=D.CLAVE_MUNICIPIO
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.TC_ESTADOS E ON A.CLAVE_ESTADO=E.CLAVE_ESTADO
WHERE A.TZ_LOCK=0
AND B.FECHA_ALTA between '01/01/10' and '31/08/16'
AND TRIM(EMAIL_CLIENTE) <> ' '
AND TRIM(EMAIL_CLIENTE) NOT LIKE '%fonacot.gob.mx'
AND TRIM(EMAIL_CLIENTE) NOT LIKE '%.@%'
AND TRIM(EMAIL_CLIENTE) NOT LIKE '%@.%'
AND TRIM(EMAIL_CLIENTE) <> '@'
AND TRIM(EMAIL_CLIENTE) <> ',@,.'
AND TRIM(EMAIL_CLIENTE) <> '.'
AND EMAIL_CLIENTE IS NOT NULL
--AND E.NOMBRE_ESTADO = 'CIUDAD DE MEXICO'
ORDER BY NOMBRE_ESTADO,NOMBRE_MUNICIPIO,NOMBRE_COLONIA_C,EMAIL_CLIENTE;
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
Seleccionar los estatus del trabajador, centro de trabajo

SELECT * FROM DWH.CAT_CLESTATUS; 
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
Seleccionar los codigos de producto

SELECT CODPRODUCTO, COUNT(*) AS TOTAL
FROM TOPAZ.CR_DISPOSICIONES
WHERE FECHAAUTORIZADO BETWEEN '01/03/2016' AND '01/06/2016'
GROUP BY CODPRODUCTO
ORDER BY CODPRODUCTO;
CODPRODUCTO TOTAL
111	25677
119	7164
121	1691
139	120
350	246979
400	1

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
Comparativo uso Credere vs Credito Seguro

/*Consulta para Credito Seguro Abr-Jun 2016*/
SELECT TO_CHAR(A.FECHAAUTORIZADO,'yyyymm') AS FECHA
       ,A.SUCURSALAUTORIZA
       ,B.NOMBRE_SUCURSAL
       ,A.USUARIO_AUTORIZA
       ,A.ESTADO
       ,SUM(A.CAPITALAUTORIZADO) AS IMP_CAPT_AUT
		   ,COUNT(A.CAPITALAUTORIZADO) AS TOT_CAPT_AUT
		   ,SUM(A.PRIMA_AUTORIZADA) AS SUM_PRIMA_AUT
       --,COUNT(PRIMA_AUTORIZADA) AS TOT_PRIMA_AUT
FROM TOPAZ.CR_DISPOSICIONES A
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.TC_SUCURSALES B ON A.SUCURSALAUTORIZA=B.SUCURSAL_ID 
WHERE A.TZ_LOCK=0
AND A.SUCURSALAUTORIZA IN (3,5,6,7,8,99)
AND A.FECHAAUTORIZADO between  '01/04/2016' and '30/06/2016'
AND A.ORIGEN IN ('I','O')
/*AND A.USUARIO_AUTORIZA IN ('1384',
'1388','1471','1479','1682','1703','1796','2039','2348',
'2531','2646','2731','2761','2923FDL','3149','3282','3284',
'3341','3511','3705','3738','3740','3846','3847','391',
'5447','5568','5604','5640','5652','5653','5678','5698',
'5702','5704','5719','5848','5884','5885','5891',
'6007','6014','6050','6051','6241','6275','6318','6538','6764')*/
GROUP BY TO_CHAR(A.FECHAAUTORIZADO,'yyyymm'),A.SUCURSALAUTORIZA,B.NOMBRE_SUCURSAL,A.USUARIO_AUTORIZA,A.ESTADO
ORDER BY TO_CHAR(A.FECHAAUTORIZADO,'yyyymm') ASC,A.SUCURSALAUTORIZA,B.NOMBRE_SUCURSAL,A.USUARIO_AUTORIZA,A.ESTADO DESC;

------------------------------------------------------
/*Consulta para Credere Abr-Jun 2016*/
SELECT TO_CHAR(A.FECHAAUTORIZADO,'yyyymm') AS FECHA
       ,A.SUCURSALAUTORIZA
       --,B.NOMBRE_SUCURSAL
       ,A.USUARIO_AUTORIZA
       ,A.ESTADO
       ,SUM(A.CAPITALAUTORIZADO) AS IMP_CAPT_AUT
		   ,COUNT(A.CAPITALAUTORIZADO) AS TOT_CAPT_AUT
		   ,SUM(A.PRIMA_AUTORIZADA) AS SUM_PRIMA_AUT
       --,COUNT(PRIMA_AUTORIZADA) AS TOT_PRIMA_AUT
FROM TOPAZ.CR_DISPOSICIONES A
--LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.TC_SUCURSALES B ON A.SUCURSALAUTORIZA=B.SUCURSAL_ID 
WHERE A.TZ_LOCK=0
AND A.SUCURSALAUTORIZA IN (3,5,6,7,8,99)
AND A.FECHAAUTORIZADO between '01/04/2016' and '30/06/2016'
--AND A.ORIGEN IN ('I','O')
/*AND A.USUARIO_AUTORIZA IN ('1384',
'1388','1471','1479','1682','1703','1796','2039','2348',
'2531','2646','2731','2761','2923FDL','3149','3282','3284',
'3341','3511','3705','3738','3740','3846','3847','391',
'5447','5568','5604','5640','5652','5653','5678','5698',
'5702','5704','5719','5848','5884','5885','5891',
'6007','6014','6050','6051','6241','6275','6318','6538','6764')*/
GROUP BY TO_CHAR(A.FECHAAUTORIZADO,'yyyymm'),A.SUCURSALAUTORIZA/*,B.NOMBRE_SUCURSAL*/,A.USUARIO_AUTORIZA,A.ESTADO
ORDER BY TO_CHAR(A.FECHAAUTORIZADO,'yyyymm') ASC,A.SUCURSALAUTORIZA/*,B.NOMBRE_SUCURSAL*/,A.USUARIO_AUTORIZA,A.ESTADO DESC;

------------------------------------------------------
/*Comprobación Bogar vs nuestro script Credito Seguro 2016*/

SELECT TO_CHAR(A.FECHAAUTORIZADO,'dd/mm/yy') AS FECHA
       --,A.SUCURSALAUTORIZA
       --,B.NOMBRE_SUCURSAL
       --,A.USUARIO_AUTORIZA
       ,A.ESTADO
       ,SUM(A.CAPITALAUTORIZADO) AS IMP_CAPT_AUT
		   ,COUNT(A.CAPITALAUTORIZADO) AS TOT_CAPT_AUT
		   ,SUM(A.PRIMA_AUTORIZADA) AS SUM_PRIMA_AUT
       --,COUNT(PRIMA_AUTORIZADA) AS TOT_PRIMA_AUT
FROM TOPAZ.CR_DISPOSICIONES A
LEFT JOIN TOPAZ.TC_SUCURSALES B ON A.SUCURSALAUTORIZA=B.SUCURSAL_ID 
WHERE A.TZ_LOCK=0
--AND A.SUCURSALAUTORIZA IN (3,5,6,7,8,99)
AND A.FECHAAUTORIZADO between '06/05/2016' and '08/05/2016'
AND A.ORIGEN IN ('I','O')
/*AND A.USUARIO_AUTORIZA IN ('1384',
'1388','1471','1479','1682','1703','1796','2039','2348',
'2531','2646','2731','2761','2923FDL','3149','3282','3284',
'3341','3511','3705','3738','3740','3846','3847','391',
'5447','5568','5604','5640','5652','5653','5678','5698',
'5702','5704','5719','5848','5884','5885','5891',
'6007','6014','6050','6051','6241','6275','6318','6538','6764')*/
GROUP BY TO_CHAR(A.FECHAAUTORIZADO,'dd/mm/yy'),A.ESTADO
ORDER BY TO_CHAR(A.FECHAAUTORIZADO,'dd/mm/yy'),A.ESTADO DESC;

GROUP BY TO_CHAR(A.FECHAAUTORIZADO,'dd/mm/yy'),A.SUCURSALAUTORIZA,B.NOMBRE_SUCURSAL,A.USUARIO_AUTORIZA,A.ESTADO
ORDER BY TO_CHAR(A.FECHAAUTORIZADO,'dd/mm/yy') ASC,A.SUCURSALAUTORIZA,B.NOMBRE_SUCURSAL,A.USUARIO_AUTORIZA,A.ESTADO DESC;
